choices: You're on the floor, and no one's noticed you shrink.
You're on the floor, but someone has noticed that you shrunk.
You're in the palm of the person who shrunk you.
1.content:
You walk into the airport with your luggage. You're going home to visit your family, or so you think. You look up at the signs to help determine where your airline's check is when suddenly everything becomes woozy. It feels as if the world is spinning around you, like you came out of the worst roller coaster ride imaginable. You close your eyes to help alleviate the dizziness. You are not sure what exactly happened after that as you pass out. You didn't know it at the time, but you shrunk to about an inch tall.

Eventually, you wake up a little dazed but feeling better. You begin to open your eyes and look around. Where are you and what do you see?
1.title: Shrunk!

choices: Stay where you are despite the risks.
Too late. Something happens to you!
11.content:
You're not sure what just happened, but you need to act fast. You are in the center of the check-in portion of the airport with a lot of foot-traffic, so you probably can't stay where you are safely. It's a wonder that you are able to stay here unconscious without getting stepped on. You need to form a plan for how you will get help and get back to your normal size.

You're freaking out as a foot crashes only a few feet from you. Calm down, you tell yourself. You look around a see a wall of feet and luggage, each of which threatens to kill you. The foot that almost crushes you is quickly followed by luggage wheels. You just manage to dodge being clipped as the giantess briskly walks by to her flight.

You take a few short breaths and begin to think up a plan. What do you do?
11.title: Decisions, Decisions

choices: Hitch a ride off of someone else.
111.content:
You decide you need to get someone to help you. You can try to get help from airport security or from some traveler. The problem with the first option is that you don't exactly know where to find airport security. You know there are various security officers walking around, but you don't know where to look, and at your size, you can barely see above shin level to know where you are or to see much of anything. The problem with the second option is that you don't know if you can trust anyone enough to risk approaching them.

A third option could be to try to hitch a ride on someone until you can find a security guard to help you. There's less risk of someone hurting you if she doesn't know you exist (or so you think at least).

What do you do?
111.title: Help!

choices: Find someone at the coffee shop.
Find someone at the baggage check line.
Find someone at the security line.
1112.content:
You decide to try to flag down on of the passengers. In the center of the airport, they are on the move, often in a rush to catch their flights. It might be easier to get someone’s attention when they are stationary.

Behind you is a coffee shop with people seated and mostly stationary. Looking around, in front of you is an airline check-in station, where passengers are waiting to check into their luggage and get their boarding passes. Off to the side of you is the security line where people are mostly standing and waiting (except for taking a step or two as the line progresses).

Which do you choose?
1112.title: Help from a Passenger

1113.content:
You decide it's safest to rid with some traveler until you see a security officer. A woman is approaching that fits looks like a good candidate. She's a business woman with a formal blouse, skirt, nylons, and heels. She looks like she's about 30 with black hair and a pretty, slender face. In her one hand, she is carrying a purse in her one hand and pulling a suitcase with her other.

You don't have time to look at her much though as she is approaching quickly, and you need to act fast. You can try to jump onto one of her heels, a risky endeavor given that they are moving fast and the slightest mistake may lead to your demise. Or you could try to hitch a ride on her suitcase, probably a safer bet, but still slight dangerous. Finally, you could try to jump onto her purse. It looks fairly high, but you think you can jump that high. Which do you hitch a ride on?
1113.title: Climb Aboard - If You Dare

11131.content: You jump onto her heels and ride there.You forget about your plan and fall asleep on them ,When you wake up you are on an airplane.You jump off the heel and walk to the bathroom to hide.Out of nowhere a girl in a blue shirt and short shorts showing her underwear and she had a huge rack.Anyways she kicks and you land near the bathroom.You dont hesitate to hide. When you hide the same girl that kicked you entered with her purse scared do you hop in to he purse or climb her feet to her pocket. Shes leaving what do.Thinking quickly you need to decide and fast.
11131.title: Her heels -

11133.content:
You decide to try jumping onto her purse. It’s fairly high off the ground but you’ve always been a good jumper. As she walks closer and closer to you, you zero in on her purse. Knowing you wouldn’t get another chance you pick your moment carefully. Then with all your might you thrust yourself into the air and reach for the bottom of her purse.

Do you make it?
11133.title: Choosing your moment

choices: The woman unzips her purse and pushes you in
111331.content:
You jump up and manage to get a firm grip on the bottom of the woman’s purse. It isn’t easy to hang on. Her purse is swaying back and forth swinging you with it.

Knowing you’ll fall off if you don’t act, you start to climb the side of her purse. It’s somewhat easy to grab onto the leather which makes you less stressed in your endever. Finally you reach the top of her purse. You’re on top of the zipper line and you’re able to get solid footing.

You sit down and say to yourself: “now I just need to find a security guard.”

Suddenly, you feel the light swinging motion of the woman’s purse stop. You look up to the see woman arriving at her gate just in time for boarding.

“No wonder she was in a rush” you think.

You start to think that maybe you should get off her purse and try something else. You have no idea where this woman’s plane is going. Likley far from where you need to go.

Before you can make a decision you see a dark shadow cover your view. You freeze in your tracks and your heart starts pounding. You slowing look up to see the giantess you’ve been hitching a ride from smiling down at you.

What happens next?
111331.title: Not out of the woods yes

choices: The woman takes you out before you can decide
1113311.content:
You continue look up at her, mesmerized by her beauty. You’re suddenly snapped out of it when you see her reaching towards you. Her dark blue finger nails slide past you and unzip her purse half way. Just as you realize what’s about to happen, the woman quickly pushes you into her purse. You fall on a tube of lipstick which slightly hurts as you make impact. You look up in horror to see the smiling woman make an evil sounding giggle and zip you in her purse.

She then continues to walk, and you again feel the swaying motion of the woman’s purse, but this time you’re trapped inside. You climb over verious pieces of makeup to find a comfortable angle in which to settle in.

You are absolutely terrified. You really did not like the sound of that giggle she made. You curse yourself for not running when you saw her staring down at you.

“Serves me right for not having enough cynicism” you say out loud.

You feel the purse get set down somewhere.

“She must have sat down in her plane” you think.

You realize that if you can manage to escape her purse there’s a good chance you could get off the plane before it takes off. You also know it’s risky. You have no idea where the woman set her purse, there’s also the possibility of getting stepped on my other boarding passengers or a flight attendent. Time is not on your side. You have to decide quick.

What do you do?
1113311.title: Kidnapped

11133111.content:
With no time to lose, you stumble around and find what feels like a tube of lipstick. With all your might, you push the tube upright against the side of the purse. You then climb up it, feel around, and find that you’re right next to the zipper. You let out a sigh in triumph. You push it at as hard as you can and sure enough, it moves just enough for you to climb out.

Wasting no time, you hoist yourself out of the purse, while breathing your first rejuvenating breath of freedom. However you knew there was no time to celebrate. Right away you look around to see where you are so you can plot your next move. After a few seconds you realize where the woman has put her purse.

Where are you?
11133111.title: Escaping her purse

111331111.content:
You look to see the woman’s massive high heel shoes right next to you. You cant see up past her legs but you assume she’s distracted when you see her tapping her left foot in a steady rhythm.

You don’t look back, you run as fast as you can away from the giantess towards the aisle. When you get to the aisle you’re somewhat relived to see everyone in their seats, but you see a stewardess with long, straight, red hair who looks like she’s in her mid 20s walking down the aisle right towards you. She doesn’t see you, but you know that one false move and you’ll be squashed by her high heel shoes. Thinking fast you skillfully weave in and out of her steps as her feet past by you with distinctive booms registering in your ears.

To you it seems like forever, but you eventually make yourself to the front of the plane. You see the door just a few feet in front of you. However, you’re out of breath and you rest for a few minutes to regain your stamina. As you’re regenerating, you see another stewardess by the door towering over you. This time she has short, straight, Black hair and looks like she’s in her late 20s. She hasn’t seen you yet, but you’re standing right in front of her so all it would take would be a short glance in your direction. Realizing that it’s now or never, you make for the door as fast as your tiny legs can take you.

What happens next?
111331111.title: Ideal escape route

choices: To try the attention of a staff member preparing for the next plane
Go to the gate to get someone’s attention
Find a place to hide for now
1113311111.content:
The stewardess reaches to close the door. You sprint with all your might and just make it through the doorway as she shuts it. You hurdle across the gap between the plane and the gateway unto the landing platform. Just a second later, the giant door closes behind you, its wind knocking you off your feet. The colossal plane leaves behind you; it’s engine deafening your world.

You made it! But, now what? You spent so long hussling to get off the plant that you didn’t think about what you would do once you did. In a few minutes another plane will dock there, and you want to be gone by the time a rush of people rush through.
1113311111.title: Narrow Break

11133111113.content:
Knowing that another plane would arrive any minute you dash under a nearby chair to hide. You know where asking for help too quickly got you last time. Plus you don’t want to be in the way when a hoard of people will be walking by.

Soon the plane you were on departs and it isn’t long before another one arrives in its place. You remain hidden and hope nobody sees you. Soon you can hear people coming out of the gate going every which way.

What happens next?
11133111113.title: Find a place to hide for now

choices: the shocked face of the stewardess
the familiar face of the business woman
1113311112.content: as you sprint the weight of a massive hand comes down on you. You look upwards to catch a glimpse of who's captured you but your vision is blocked by the giant fingers that wrap around your little body. You feel the movement of your captor walking but you can't see anything from within their clenched fist. Eventually the fingers part and you see...
1113311112.title: Someone grabs you

choices: Kate putting you in her breast pocket
11133111121.content:
“Oh my god! Are you a tiny person?” she says softly.

You realize that you’re in the lavatory and safe from your former captor. For now.

You nervously nod your head at the woman who’s name tag reads “Kate”.

“Wow” Kate says with a growing smile. “How did you get so small?”

“I have no idea.” You reply still feeling very nervous. “I just fainted and woke up like this.”

“I see. Well, how did you get on this plane?”

“Well..” you start. “I tried to ask this woman for help, I tried to get her attention by climbing on her purse but then when she saw me she just grinned at me, knocked me into her purse, and trapped me in there. Next thing I know I’m on this plane. I managed to escape her purse and I tried to get off the plane. That’s when you showed up. I have no idea what she wants with me but her intentions can’t be the best since she kidnapped me.”

“I see” said the stewardess. “Do you know where this woman is sitting?”

“Yes” you reply. “By the window right in the middle of plane on the left side. Can you please...”

Before you can finish your thought Kate smiles at you and quickly closes her hand once again trapping you in her fist. As she exits the lavatory and starts walking, you feel the steady motion of her footsteps. Soon she opens her fist again. You look up to see...
11133111121.title: the shocked face of the stewardess

111331111213.content:
Kate goes to her seat. Gently she deposits you into her breast pocket. It’s a tight fit but your feel comfortable and secure.

“We’re about to take off so I have to give safety instructions and start work” Explains Kate. “I will help you after we land. For now I’m going to have to keep you in my pocket. Is that ok?” She says peeking in to look at you.

You nod with a shy smile.

“Ok, you look like you don’t mind” giggles Kate. “I never got your name little guy.”

Feeling a little more confident you tell Kate your name.

“Nice name” she says. “I hope you’re comfy” she finishes with a smile.

With that she closes her pocket and starts giving the safety instructions before returning to her seat for take off. The plane takes off and as it reaches cruising altitude Kate starts her in flight service. The steady motion of Kate’s movement is almost soothing and you start to relax. Soon however, you hear a familiar voice.

“Excuse me Miss!” Says the voice.

Right away you realize it is the business woman. Your eyes grow wide in fear and you don’t move a muscle.

“Yes ma’am?” You hear Kate say.
111331111213.title: Safe keeping

choices: The stewardess holds take-off to help her find it.
The stewardess asks for her to wait until after the flight.
1113311113.content:
You run as fast as you can with your tiny feet towards the massive door, but the stewardess just closes. You’re stuck on the plane. With one giant step, she walks far away to take care of other business.

Your former captress has stood up, inspecting the area under the seats around her.

The stewards walks up to her and politely asks, “Ma’am, we’re getting ready for take-off. Is everything okay?”

“I lost something underneath the seat.”

“I see. What?”

“Umm, it’s a long story…”

Trying to get as far away from the scene as possible, you run behind the edge of the flight attendants’ seat area in the front and hide behind the chair of the stewardess who’s currently up.

After the safety features, the woman does not find you, of course.
1113311113.title: Checking the Seat

choices: Ask on of the other passengers for help
Before you can decide your vision suddenly goes dark.
11133111132.content:
The stewardess once again goes through the cabin to make sure everything is ready for take off as the plane taxis to the runway. She goes by the business woman who is still looking for you.

“Did you find it yet ma’am?” Asked the stewardess.

“No, I didn’t” replied the woman impatiently. “Can I please get up and look for it?”

“No, I’m sorry, you’re going to have to wait until after the flight” the stewardess says in a sympathetic tone.

“Ok” the woman says with an unnerving tone of irritation and determination.

You heard the tone in her voice and you knew she was determined to find you during the flight. The thought of getting recaptured by her frightened you.

Suddenly you see the flight attendant going back to her seat. She doesn’t see that you are hiding behind her seat. You don’t really see what she looks like nor do you think it’s worth exposing your hiding place to find out. You let out a sigh a relief as this gives you time to plot your next move. You hold on to the bottom of the stewardess’s seat as the plane takes off. As the plane reaches cruising altitude and levels out the stewardess gets up and begins the in flight service.

You start to consider what your options are. You think about staying in your hiding place for the rest of the flight and escaping hopefully unseen. You also think about asking one of the passengers for help. Then again asking for help is what got you into this mess and you’re worried about the woman seeing you. You think for a moment and decide to...
11133111132.title: The stewardess asks for her to wait until after...

111331111321.content:
You decide that it’s best to remain hidden. You figure that asking for help isn’t the best idea especially seeing that’s what got you kidnapped in the first place. You have no idea where the plane is going but you reason that you’ll find out when you land. You use the time you have to plan what you’re going to do once you land. Every now and then you hear the booms of people’s footsteps since your hiding place is next to the lavatory. A few hours into the flight you start to drifting off to sleep.

Suddenly, just as you’re about to fall asleep you hear a loud ground-shaking boom. One that is louder than the others. Startled by the noise you nervously peak over to the aisle to find out where the noise was coming from. Your worst fear is confirmed. The business woman that kidnapped you is walking straight towards your hiding place. Her healed shoes register as loud deafening booms with every step she takes.

You hope she’s just going to the lavatory. Then you notice that she is slowly walking down the aisle trying to look discreet as she looks at every seat row. You realize she must be looking for you. You gulp in fear and bolt back behind the seat.

The booms get louder and louder with every step she makes. Petrified, you hold your breath and pray that she doesn’t see you. All of the sudden the loud booms stop. You look over to see the heal from one of her high heeled shoes just less than a foot from you. You slowly look up and see her...
111331111321.title: Remaining hidden

choices: You run down the aisle to the back of the plane.
You run towards the windows section where you have the least visibility.
She opens the door and starts heading back (whether she sees you or not).
1113311113212.content:
Her wiggling toes stand directly in front of you, almost threatening you with their power. You stand perfectly still. Not wanting to draw attention to yourself, and look up at the Asian woman. She is scanning the plane, while she waits in front of the lavatory. Luckily for you, her eyes are looking several feet away, not right under her nose. You don’t dare move though, for fear that that might change. You fear that the slightest shift of her feet might cause her to notice you.

She doesn’t though. Soon the lavatory door opens, and to your relief, she opens it and locks herself inside.

Free, you sprint as far away as you can, so that doesn’t happen again. Where do you go?
1113311113212.title: Motionless

choices: No. You feel her hand wrap around you
Yes. She is referring to something else.
11133111132123.content:
You reason that you don’t have time to run given how tiny your legs are and how she didn’t think to look directly down earlier. Still petrified, you remain stiff as a statue as you hear her wash her hands and prepare to exit the lavatory.

Then, you hear a deafening boom as she steps out. Again, her massive polished toes stop right in front of you.

“Well well what have we here?” You hear her boom with excitement.

Your eyes nearly pop out in fear as you hear her utter those words. You slowly move your eyes up and hope she isn’t referring to you.

Does your luck hold?
11133111132123.title: A risky move

choices: I’m going to keep you as my tiny husband
Give you to one of my friends at this conference I’m going to
111331111321231.content:
You slowly look up to see her hand coming straight for you. Before you can think, her giant fingers wrap around you and scoop you up off the floor. The woman goes back into the lavatory and opens up her hand. She slowly brings you up to her giant face where you’re eye level with her and her red lips slowly curl into a big smile.

“You really had me worried there little cutie!” She said. “I thought I lost you for good. Why did you try to escape?” She asks.

“Because I was afraid of what you were going to do with me.” You reply nervously. “I tired to ask your help and you Kidnapped me. You pushed me into your purse against my will so I thought you weren’t going to help me and do something bad.”

“I’m sorry” she said fake frowning at you. “You were just the cutest thing I’ve ever seen. I just had to take you. I couldn’t have anyone else see you now could I?” She said smiling again.

You stare at her with a loss for words. You don’t know what to say and you still don’t know what she wants to do with you.

“I suppose that now that we have alone time we can do proper introductions.” She says happily. “My name is Tiffany, I am a marketing consultant and I travel a lot for my company. Right now I’m on my way to London. What’s your name little guy?”

You nervously tell her your name.

“I-I’m in college and I was going home until I was shrunk somehow.” You continue to say.

“Well, I don’t know how you shrunk but you’re mine now. I guess today was my lucky day. So I suppose you’re half right, you belong to me now so I won’t help you get back to normal size, but I won’t hurt you.” she says winking at you with a huge smile.

“W-What? What do you mean?” Which is all you can say in your state of shock.

“I mean..”
111331111321231.title: Recaptured

choices: Tiffany keeps you in her bra for the rest of the flight
Tiffany takes you out mid flight
1113311113212311.content:
“Husband?!” You say in disbelief.

“That’s right little guy” says the Asian beauty. “You see, my husband just left me out of nowhere not too long ago for some bitch. I’ve been feeling very lonely ever since.”

Tiffany starts stroking you with her finger as she talks.

“And you would make a perfect new husband. You’re tiny so you can never leave me, I can make you do anything I want, and I can take you everywhere with me. My job requires me to travel a lot but that’s not a problem since I can just stick you in my purse or bra and take you with me.”

“Listen Tiffany, you’re seem like a really nice lady.” You say nervously but also trying to sound polite. “But I cant be your husband, you’re a total stranger plus I can’t stay tiny forever I have my own life.”

“You HAD your own life” Tiffany corrects. “Now your life is with me. You’ll get used to it, besides it’s not like you have a choice”

“But you can’t just...”

“No more talking” Tiffany interrupts. “I think it’s time for us to go back to our seat, honey. I’ll put you in my bra this time so I can keep a closer eye on you.”

Tiffany picks you up by your shirt collar and puts you in her bra cup and pats you in to secure you.

“Are you comfy sweetie? It’s going to be a long flight, but if you’re a good boy I’ll take you out for some fresh air later.”

You look up and nod at her knowing that’s all you can really do at this point. Tiffany then walks back to her seat, her heals register as loud booms with every step she takes. As she sits down she adjusts her bra so you’re snug against her nipple. You hate to admit it but it is pretty cozy. You feel her hand press against you from outside her bra as if she was affectionately touching you.

You know you can’t be this woman’s shrunken husband. After all you have your own life, but you are relieved that the woman doesn’t seems to have any malevolent intentions towards you.


What happens next?
1113311113212311.title: Tiny husband

choices: Your captress spots you trying to escape
111331112.content:
As you find even footing on the top of the purse you look down to see you and the purse is in the woman’s lap. Your heart sinks as you slowly look up. You’re a little relieved to see the woman wearing a headset and reading a book.

“She’s not paying attention” you think. “I still have a chance.”

She also has the row to herself which lowers the risk of someone next to her seeing you. Your next move is to look out the window. You see the plane is still parked at the gate. This lifts your spirits further as you start to climb down her purse.

You hesitate to step foot on her lap. This is the moment she could see you. Eventually, with all the courage you can muster, you do it. You look up with relief to see she still hasn’t spotted you.

You realize your next move will be hard. You come to the conclusion that there are two options: you can either climb down the woman’s blouse and then jump to the ground. Or you can jump to the next seat over and find another way down. Both are equally risky, but you have to choose quickly. You see the stewardesses closing the overhead bins preparing for take off.

What’s do you decide?
111331112.title: Not clear yet

choices: You are grabbed by someone else.
1113311122.content:
You back up to get some space, then you run as fast as you can until the last possible moment. You then jump as hard as you can off the woman’s lap.

You barely make it, but you land safely on the seat next to the woman. You land on all fours and quickly stand up to regain your balance. The aisle is only a few inches away but at your height it’ll take as least a few minutes to run there. You know that time is of the essence so without wasting any time you run as fast as you can to the edge of the row. At your height it is a long way down to the floor. You start to wonder if this route was was such a good idea.

Suddenly, out of the corner of your eye, you see the business woman who kidnapped you put down her book and turn to her purse. Then she notices the little hole that was made by you unzipping it when you first escaped. You see her put her hand over her mouth and completely unzip her purse.

“Shit!l you heard her whisper to herself. “He got out!”

You are frozen in terror when you heard her.

All of the sudden...
1113311122.title: Leap of faith

choices: Before you can decide, the woman sees you trying to get out of her purse
11133112.content:
You figure that it’s best to stay in her purse for now. People are still boarding and you feel that it’s better not risk your life trying to escape. Still you were terrified knowing that you were trapped. You kept wondering what the woman was going to do with you. It gave you an uneasy feeling when you remembered the way she smiled at you when she first saw you. She definitely didn’t show any surprise in seeing you.

“Maybe she just thought I was cute or something” you think. “Just because she wasn’t shocked doesn’t mean she’s behind me ending up like this.”

Just then you hear one of the stewardesses giving safety instructions. Not long after, you feel the plane taking off. The thought of being trapped comes back, but you know there’s nothing you can do about it now. You’re stuck on the plane.

Now that the plane is in the air and everyone is in their seats you feel like it’s a good time to plot your next move. You feel around the top of the purse and suddenly you feel the zipper. With all your might you push on it. Eventually it budges just enough for you to poke your head out. You hoist yourself through the hole high enough to expose only your head. You look around and see the purse is on the seat next to the woman. You look up and see your giant captress wearing earphones and reading a book.

“This could be my chance” you say to yourself.

Still you know the risks. Even if you were able to escape the woman’s purse there’s still the possibility of her spotting you as you try to get off the seat. Even if you get that far there’s still no certainty that someone would help you. Thinking about your options you...
11133112.title: Staying put

choices: You find a clue in the purse about what may happen to you
111331122.content:
You suddenly get cold feet and let yourself fall back into the purse, you figure the risk is too great seeing all the obstacles you’d have to get through to escape. You also reason that whatever this woman has planned for you isn’t going to get you hurt or killed judging by the way she smiled at you earlier. Still, you don’t want to take any chances and you push the zipper closed again so the woman can’t see that you tried to get out. However, you leave it open just a little bit so you’re not in complete darkness. All you can see through the hole the ceiling of the plane and nothing else.

You figure that you won’t find out your fate until after you land, so you try to make yourself as comfortable as you can in the kidnapper’s purse to wait out the flight.

What happens next?
111331122.title: Decide it’s too risky

choices: The woman’s giant face smiling down at you
Darkness: you’re still in the woman’s purse.
1113311222.content:
Despite the fact you’re trapped in some strange woman’s purse, you manage to make yourself comfortable. Luckily for you, your leathery prison makes for a good bed. You find a nice place to lay down. In a surprisingly short amount of time you drift off to sleep.

You begin to dream about how after a long flight you finally see your family. You hadn’t seen them in almost a year and as they drive you home you think about how wonderful it will be to catch up with them and play with your kid cousins again. Your parents ask you how your flight was and you tell them it was wonderful and nothing went wrong. Suddenly your vision goes dark as you drive into what looks like a black void. You open your mouth to scream but no sound comes out.

You open your eyes and sadly realize it was just a dream. You slowly look up to see...
1113311222.title: Sleeping through the flight

choices: The woman gets into a taxi
The woman meets her friend at the airport
The woman takes you out of her purse
11133112222.content:
All you see is darkness with just a speck of light coming in from the top of the woman’s purse. You realize you’re still the captive of a the giant business woman. Suddenly you hear a muffled voice that you assume is instructing passengers to fasten their seatbelts to prepare for landing. You can’t make out everything the person was saying but you hear the destination of your flight: New York City.

You aren’t surprised seeing that your captress was a businesswoman. Your ears pop as the aircraft descends through the clouds. All you could think about is what is going to happen to you. The uncertainty makes you extremely anxious. You feel a defining bump as the plain touches down on the runway. To you it feels like an eternity before the airplane comes to a stop at the gate.

Then comes the moment you’ve been dreading. There’s a sudden jolt as you feel the woman grab her purse and exit the aircraft. Your heart is pounding as you are carried through the airport in the woman’s purse swinging slightly back and forth. You can hear deafening booms from the woman’s high heels every time they hit the hard floor in the terminal. After about 10 minutes the loud booms stop. Realizing the woman has stopped walking you brace yourself for what may await you.

What happens next?
11133112222.title: Darkness: you’re still in the woman’s purse.

112.content:
You decide that staying out here was tantamount to suicide and trying to get someones attention while they're busy rushing around for a flight was just as dangerous. The smartest choice would be to hide somewhere that would get you to someone where they're not rushing around, preferably a ticket gate for a plane. You spot a family with a bunch of luggage and carry on bags on the floor nearby, just close enough for you to reach safety. There's only 3 of them, all female. A mother and probably two kids from either a previous or current engagement.

There's a girlish purse, probably the teenager girl's. Then there's a more sophisticated purse, probably belonging to the mother. After that is a little girl's backpack. Which choice would suit your current needs best?
112.title: A Plan.

choices: She puts you in her pocket.
She shows you to her mom.
She puts you in her backpack.
114.content:
"What is that?" You heard a voice shout. You look behind to see a giant girl staring down at you. She is tall and skinny with long legs (especially long for you) and looks to be about 12.

Before you can respond, you are snatched and hoisted into the air. She lifts you up to her face and opens her palm out to get a better look at you. You can do nothing but stand on her palm and stare back. She has dirty-blonde hair and blue eyes.

"What are you?"

"I need your help. I..." you began to stammer but are quickly interrupted. She's too shocked and confused to listen to you.

"You're like a doll. Except so realistic! And you talk!"

"I'm not a doll..." you tried to interject, but again you are interrupted this time by a voice calling from far away.

"Anne, come on! We're going to miss the plan if you don't hurry!"

"But mother I found something!"

"I don't care. We need to go. We still need to go through security."

"Yes mother."

She then closed her fist and ran to follow behind her mom. You were stuck on the roller coaster of your life as she thrashed her arm (and thus you) up and down. Eventually, the hell stopped when security line. While she's waiting, she unclenched her fist to determine what to do with you. What does she do?
114.title: Spotted

choices: The girl's hand reaches in to grasp you
You decide to try and escape
you curl up and fall asleep
1141.content: The girl looks down at you and says "I'll play with you later, I was worried the plane ride would be really boring." Before you can respond she thrusts you into the pockets of the jean shorts she's wearing. It's dark in the pocket and you're constantly thrown from side to side, the girl and her family must be hurrying to catch their plane. After being tumbled through this girl's pocket for god knows how long things eventually quiet down. You can hear the muffled noise of a crowd from outside the pocket, you can't tell if the girl is sitting on the plane or if she's somewhere in the airport still. Eventually...
1141.title: She puts you in her pocket.

choices: On a backseat of a car
On a seat in a gate at the airport
11412.content:
You climb up the side of the girl’s pocket. You figure since she’s not moving much that this would be a perfect time to try and escape. Besides, from what she said she thinks of you as just a doll and you don’t want to become some giant girl’s toy.

You eventually climb your way to the top of the girl’s pocket. You see she’s sitting down and you’re relieved since you don’t have that long of a fall as you jump to freedom. You land on your hands and feet and steadily stand up and realize you are....
11412.title: Escape!

choices: You climb down the girl’s leg
You climb down the woman’s leg
Both of them get up before you can decide what to do
114122.content:
You see you’re in a gate in the airport. Right away you know you have to act fast. It’s only a matter of time before the girl notices you’re gone and starts looking for you.

You quickly look to your left and then to your right. To your left is the giant girl who captured you. To your right is a woman that you’re pretty sure is her mom. She has the same blue eyes and dirty brown hair as the girl.

You figured your only two options is to climb down one of their legs to the floor. You see the girl is distracted by something on her phone, but you’re afraid of what she’ll do to you if she sees you climbing down her leg in an attempt to escape. There’s also the fact she’s wearing shorts, so distracted or not she’s likley going to feel a tiny man walking down her leg. The woman next to her is far more alert but you don’t feel as much anxiety with the thought of using her as an escape route. She’s also wearing long jeans so as long as she doesn’t actually see you chances are she wouldn’t feel you climbing down her leg. Weighing the options you make a decision...
114122.title: Thinking fast

choices: The girl sees you trying to escape
The girl thinks you’re a bug and swipes you off her leg
She didn’t notice you, it’s all in your head
1141221.content:
You figure that the girl is distracted enough to not notice you. With that in mind. You climb up the side of her shorts and begin to walk down. You spread your arms out to keep your balance. Luckily for you her legs are out straight so it’s a fairly easy downward incline. You just have to go fast enough so you don’t get notice but not too fast to where you’ll fall off.

Slowly but surely you make your way down her leg. There are a few times where you almost lose your balance but you quickly recover. Suddenly just as you’re about to reach her sock, her leg moves. You cling to it with all your might and narrowly avoid falling to an almost certain death. All of the sudden you get a sickening feeling inside. You slowly look up to see...
1141221.title: You climb down the girl’s leg

11412211.content:
You see a giant hand coming towards you. Before you know it the girl once again scoops you up in her hand. She brings her hand to her face and opens it up. You are startled to see her giant face staring at you, moreso you’re terrified that she caught you trying to escape.

The girl gives you one stroke with her finger on your head. “Now how did you get out?” she said in a playful tone.

You just stare at her in a petrified state of terror

“Dolls aren’t supposed to walk” she added.

You couldn’t believe what you were hearing. She still actually thinks you’re a doll. Or she could just be having fun with you. Either way her words scared you.

“I’m not a doll!” You manage to say “I’m a..”

Before you could finish your sentence she put her finger to your mouth to “sush” you.

“No, you’re my doll” she said in a more stern voice. “You’re mine and I will do what I want with you. It’ll be fun to have a doll that’s so lifelike”

Suddenly you heard another voice.

“Anne, who are you talking to?” Said the woman sitting next to you.

“Anne” quickly closes her hand.

“No one mom” she said quickly as she stuffs you back into her pocket.

What happens next?
11412211.title: Recaptured

choices: Says yes and hands you back to Anne
Puts you in her purse (she plans to keep you for herself)
114122111.content:
“Anne what did you just put in your pocket?”

“Nothing mom!” She replied trying to sound sincere.

“Anne..” her mom said in a stern voice. “Don’t lie to me. Show me what’s in your pocket.”

Reluctantly, Anne takes you out and shows you to her mom. Her mom puts her hand over her mouth in shock as she stares at you in disbelief while you sit calmly on Anne’s palm trying not to show how terrified you are.

Gently, Anne’s mom picks you up with her thumb and index finger and brings you to her gigantic but flawless face before dropping you onto her open palm. She continues to stare at you in disbelief as she examines you.

“Are, are you a little person?” She finally said still in a state of shock.

You nod nervously.

“How did you get so small?” She said in a slightly more collected tone.

“I don’t know, but your daughter found me and put me in her pocket. I was trying to escape but then she captured me again.”

She looked over at Anne with her mouth open in disbelief.

“Anne, is this true” she said softly.

“Yes I found him on the floor” she admitted. “Can I please keep him mom? He’s so cute and I will take good care of him!” She pleaded.

Anne’s mom looked over at her daughter and continued staring at you for a moment. Eventually she...
114122111.title: Her mom doesn’t believe her

1141221111.content:
The mother thinks for a moment before smiling, "Well I guess you have been asking for a new pet for awhile now so I don't see why not. Just be extra careful with him okay sweetheart?"

"Yay thank you mom!" the girls squeals as her mom hands you back to her, "you hear that dolly, you're gonna be my doll AND my pet now!"

"No let me go!" you squeal and wiggle in her grasp, pounding her hand with your fists.

The girl giggles, "That tickles!"

"Now you better teach your little doll some manners Anne," the mother says to her, "He should treat you with respect if you're going to be taking care of him!"

"Gotcha," the girl says before turning to you, "I think you need a timeout!"

With that the girl lowers you into...
1141221111.title: Says yes and hands you back to Anne

11412211111.content:
The girl once again lowers you to the open pocket of her pants and sets you inside, much to your dismay.

She sets you against her thigh before retreating her hand out and patting the pocket to secure you in place. You try to wiggle out but find it too difficult at this point. After awhile you feel her stand up and begin walking, you assume onto a plane. Eventually she sits down again and you hear what sounds like a plane taking off.

After awhile you start to wiggle again and find you can get closer to the mouth of the pocket. After awhile...
11412211111.title: Her pocket

114122111112.content:
You claw your way to the lip of the girl’s pocket and you stick your head out. With all your might you squeeze out of her tight pocket and climb onto her lap. You look around to see that you are indeed on an airplane soaring through the air to god knows where.

You look up to see Anne listening to music with earphones and looking out the window. To your left you see her mom reading a book. Your heart sinks as you realize the only way to escape is to walk across Anne’s lap, onto her mom’s and down her straight leg to freedom. It’s risky but you figure it’s too late to turn back now. You do not want to become this girls doll/pet.

You cautiously walk across Anne’s lap. Luckily for you she’s too zoned in to whatever she’s listening to. You try to get an even footing as you step onto the mom’s lap.

As you step foot onto the mom’s lap what happens?
114122111112.title: You escape!

1141221111121.content:
The moment your foot touches the mother's leg you feel a tightness around your whole body as you are lifted into the air.

"Now where do you think you're going, hmmm?" Anne says, taking her earbuds out of her ears and lifts you to her face, "Looks like someone was being naughty and trying to run away again like a bad boy."

"Just let me go you big brat!" you yell, "I'm not going to be your stupid doll or pet or whatever!"

"Tsk tsk tsk, such a naughty boy," she says smiling at your yelling, "I think it's time for another punishment."

"What?" you ask before she plants you face down on her leg.

"Naughty dollies get spanked," she says lifting her finger to your rear and begins painfully flicking you.

"Ow! Hey stop it! Ow!" you yell as she continues your punishment.

By the end of it you feel like your butt is on fire with how painful each flick hit you. She finally raises you back up to her.

"Now, are you going to be a good dolly from now on? Or do i have to punish you again?"

Thinking a moment you say...
1141221111121.title: Anne notices you

choices: “No, I think he’s learned his lesson”
11412211111211.content:
“Okay! I’ll be good” you shout not wanting to be flicked again.

“Thats a good boy” said Anne playfully. “Now..”

“Anne? What’s going on?” Anne’s mom said putting down her book.

“My little pet was trying to escape again.” Anne said sweetly

“Oh really” she said looking straight at you.

You gulped in fear as her mom looked at you as if she was looking at a naughty pet.

“Would you like me to keep him in my purse? I’ll make sure he doesn’t escape. Then you can have him back when we land” her mom suggested.

Anne looked at you still laying down on her lap rubbing your butt from the spanking you received and thought for a minute..
11412211111211.title: "I'll be good!"

choices: Pop your head out to look at possible escape options
Anne takes you out again before you can do anything else
114122111112112.content:
“I think he’s learned his lesson.” Anne replied.

“Are you sure honey?” Her mom asks.

“Yes mom, watch.” Anne focuses her attention to you and opens up her pocket. “Okay little pet, show my mom what a good little boy you are and get back in my pocket.”

Not wanting to be tortured again you reluctantly step into her pocket feet first and crawl in.

“Good dolly” Anne says to you in cutesy tone as she closes her pocket and pats you in to secure you.

“Wow, good job Anne” you hear her mom say. “I guess you are responsible enough to have your own pet now.”

“Thanks mom!” She exclaims. “I promise I’ll take good care of him.”

“I know you will honey.” Her mom said in a loving voice. “We will get him a proper pen when we get home”

You then feel Anne leaning in to hug her mom. You know you need to get out of Anne’s clutches before she has a chance to lock you in a cage or something. You figure you’d never escape then, but you also know that you have to be very careful.

What do you do now?
114122111112112.title: “No, I think he’s learned his lesson”

choices: Try to slide out and risk her noticing
Try to pound against her to get her attention
1141221111122.content:
You start briskly walking across the mom’s shorts, towards the edge of the seat. You’re about halfway across her thigh, when you feel a mini-earthquake underneath you. The mom casually shifts her sitting position while reading, bringing her other leg on top of the one you’re on.

You panic. Her large leg bares directly on top of you. You have no where to go as her leg comes crashing down. Luckily her unflexed muscles and little layer of fat provide a cushion for you, meaning you don’t get squashed, but you are still unable to move surrounded by her leg.

You’re not sure what to do, or how long your body can handle this.
1141221111122.title: Shifting Positions

1141221111123.content:
You hold your breath and look up. The mom doesn’t see you. You’re too small to be noticed by someone who is focusing on a book. Still, you proceed with great caution to make sure you aren’t detected.

Soon you reach the mom’s knee. This is it. You think to yourself. You have no choice but to slide down her leg and hope to God she doesn’t notice you. You glance up, cross your heart, and slide down her leg.

You make it down safely and immediately glance up to see Anne’s mom hadn’t moved a muscle. You let out a sigh of relief and run toward the aisle. You make it to the aisle just passed Anne’s mom’s seat and you conclude you have two options for your next move. You can either find somewhere to hide, away from Anne, for the remainder of the flight or you can go and find someone to help you.

You mull over your options for a moment and decide to...
1141221111123.title: Luck is still on your side

choices: You climb up underneath the seat in front of you where no one can see you.
You try to get more distance from her before finding a hiding spot.
11412211111231.content:
You decide that your best bet is to hide. You are in a small space. Given your past experiences with this girl and her mother, you can’t be sure anyone else you might encounter will help you. You figure after the flight lands and the passengers leave the flight, you might be able to find a staff member who would help you. You fear that right now anyone who found you might just return you to Anne or her mom.

You sneak into the foot space underneath the seat in front of the mother and daughter.
11412211111231.title: Hide

choices: You stay calm and continue looking for a spot.
She manages to see you under there.
114122111112312.content:
Suddenly you hear a high-pitched shriek. Anne shouts, “My doll’s gone!” at the top of her lungs, startling both her mother but also most of the nearby passengers.

Her feet kick violently forward as she desperately digs into her pocks and feels all over her pants looking for you. They become dangerously close to kicking you underneath the seat.
114122111112312.title: Found Missing

choices: Someone in the row in front of you notices your movements.
People are too busy looking at crying Anne to see you.
1141221111123121.content:
In panic, you bolt forward away from the range of Anne. Adrenaline provoked a fight-flight response, and your body executed flight. You ran as fast as you could underneath the seat into the row in front of you, with little thought about where you were going except for away from Anne.

You hear Anne crying and shrieking behind you, but you pay no mind.
1141221111123121.title: Run Away!

choices: She doesn’t notice you or move positions.
She doesn’t notice you but is about to put her foot down where you are lying.
11412211111231211.content:
You are focusing too much on getting away from Anne that you don’t pay attention to where you are headed. You crash hard against a fleshy wall.

It takes you a second to realize what that was. The passenger in the row in front of them had rested her crunched toes against the floor with the sole of her foot vertically in front of you. She must be leaning backwards to see what is going on behind her. You run right into the sole of her foot.
`
11412211111231211.title: Crash

choices: A passenger sitting across from Anne and her mom
11412211111233.content:
Before you can decide on your next move you feel a hand wrap around you and cover you in darkness. You are hoisted up off the ground so fast you get dizzy from the g-forces as you are lifted up to the owner of the hand’s face. The owner opens up their hand to look at you but you’re too dizzy at the moment to see who it is but hope it’s not who you think it is.

After a few seconds your clear vision comes back who see the giant face of...
11412211111233.title: Too late! Someone grabs you.

1141221112.content:
Anne’s mom ponders for a few moments, and says, “You’re too long for such a big responsibility. Maybe we can start you off with an easier pet like a hamster or a hermit crab and build from there.”

“But Mom,” she whines.

Her mom will have none of it. You begin to turn around and express your gratitude to this woman who saved you from a life suffering as her little girls pet, but when you do, you see her giant grinning face staring right back down on you.

“No,” she contines to Anne. “He’s a pet for an adult. I’ll take care of him.”

Before you or she can give either of your objections, she drops you into her purse and zips it up.

“Now, we need to line up to board,” her mom announces. “Let’s go.”
1141221112.title: Out of the Kettle into the Fire

1143.content:
"I need to hide you while we go through security, so I'm going to put you into my backpack."

Before you can protest, she reaches her other arm around her shoulder and slings her backpack in front of her, unzips on of the compartments, and slides you in. You fall in between what looks like a book on your left and some kind of mushy snack on your right. At least the snack is in a wrapper, meaning that it doesn't make a mess all over you. You tumble all over though as she walks through the line.

You can sort of recognize what's going on outside by the sounds. She's about to go through. She drops her backpack off at the scanner. When she sets it down, you're whole world turns on its head, literally. Everything including the delicate balance that kept you from being completely crushed between her book and snack was based on the backpack being vertical. Now that the backpack is flipped horizontally, the force of gravity shifted 90 degrees, so the book which previously to your right is now on top of you, and the snack below you. Struggling to breathe, you desperately try to wiggle your way out as you hear a series of computer beeps and clicks of the scanner.

Does the backpack make it through security all right or will it be checked?
1143.title: Through security

11432.content:
"Is this your bag ma'am?" You hear a stern lady ask. So you're being checked.

"Yes."

"Okay, do you mind if I take a look?"

The lady picks the bag up and unzips it. You just manage to get out from underneath the book, when everything becomes vertical again. You slide down the book landing on something you can't quite make out. The zipper unzips, and a hand reaches in feeling the contents. What is she looking for?
11432.title: Checked

114321.content:
The hand went right towards and pulled you out.

"I saw something moving in the scanners. Live creatures are not allowed in carry-ons," the lady scolds.

"But it's a doll, not a live creature!"

"Hmm, then why was it moving?"

"Oh, if you press a button it moves and talks. It must have pressed by accident."

Is the lady convinced or does she confiscate you?
114321.title: Found

choices: She gives you to her supervisor to determine what to do with.
1143212.content:
"Okay, show me then," she demands.

The girl reaches out towards your chest, pretending to "push some button" on you. Not sure what she's about to do, you instinctively freak out, run to theknew edge of the lady's palm, and put your arms out to defend yourself against the girl's finger.

"No, that's things alive. He ran away before you came close to him. Only a living thing can respond like that. Sorry, little girl, but I must take this."

"But..." she protests.

"No," the lady says as she closes her fist around you. "Rules are rules."

You hear the girl walk away crying. In a few seconds, the first reopens, and you see the lady looking down at you. She looks to be in her mid-thirties with black hair and green eyes.

"What are you?" she asks.

You explain how you were going through the airport and suddenly shrunk.

"Hmm, I've never seen this happen before," she replies after you are finished.

What does she do?
1143212.title: Confiscated

11432122.content:
"Can you take me to my plane? I want to get home to see my family."

"I don't know. I'm not sure what the protocol for this is," she answers. "We need to check with my supervisor before we can do anything. I'm supposed to report all confiscated items anyways."

"But, I need to..." you respond.

"Plus, you illegally tried to smuggle yourself into the airport."

"That wasn't my choice. The girl...."

She wasn't really listening anymore though. She took you through a hallway and into another room, presumably the office of her supervisor.

"Rachel, look what I found."

You are then dropped into the desk of her supervisor, presumably Rachel.

"What is it?"

"A little man that a girl was trying to smuggle in on her carry-on."

"I see. Okay, thanks for your help. I can take it from her."

With that the security officer left. You look up at Rachel. She's a brunette with bony face and brown eyes.

"Can you help me?" you ask.
11432122.title: The Girl Sticks to the Books

114321222.content:
"I don't know," she answers. "What does 'helping you' involve?"

You explain to her your predicament and that you want to go home, and then again ask for her help.

"Well, I can't technically let you in after this incident. You were found in her possession, so you have to remain at the station for the sake of records."

"What do you mean?! I'm a person, not some record!"

"Well, little person," she corrects. "It'll be a bureaucratic nightmare to get the proper clearance to let you through. It'll be easier to just keep you here."

"What!"

"Plus, I always wanted a little man like you. It would be more fun to keep you."

"But..."

Now her face suddenly turned stern and mean as she brought it right up to your body. It was like a house to you. Her lips were directly in front of her mouth. You gasped as you realized that it alone was twice your size.

"I wouldn't talk back to me if I were you," she scolded. As she talked her breath, blew my face and back backwards almost knocking me down. After she finished her statement, she blew a little, toppling me over completely. She smirked in enjoyment as she brought her face back over top of you. Her lips were practically touching you as you lay paralyzed with fear.

"Are we clear?"

"Yes," you reluctantly concede.

"Now the first thing I need for you to do for me, my little man, is give me a foot rub."

Before you can object, you are picked up and dropped on the ground beneath the desk in between her giant feet. She's wearing heels that she flicks off, nearly falling on top of you.

"Come on. Give them a good rub."

You look at her huge smelly feet. Her toes are wiggling inviting you over. Do you rub them or not?
114321222.title: Security is not that secure after all.

1143212221.content:
You walk over to her right foot and begin to rub. The moment you touch it, her foot reflectively wiggles pushing you over. You begin with the big toe and then move down the various toes. You can hear her groaning from above as you rub.

"That's it little man. It feels amazing!"

Within a few minutes, the phone rings.

"Hello,.... Hey Sarah! How are you?.... Yeah, yeah I can talk right now. I'm not too busy...."

You can here talking on the phone to what sounds like some friend. As she jabbers on, you continue rubbing. You are now down to her third toe. As you reach your arm in between her third and fourth toe to start rubbing, your arm gets stuck. Frantically you try to push it out, but you can't. Rachel keeps on talking, not noticing your predicament. As a matter of fact, she seems to have forgotten about you entirely.

"Yeah, I would love to meet after work...."

She lifts her leg up and places it on her knee. With you wedged in between her toes, you are now stuck, dangling into the air.

"We should totally catch up..."

You look up at her from underneath the desk. She's paying absolutely no attention to you. You desperately try to loosen yourself from this bind, but to little avail. You kick and cream, but she takes no notice. You wiggle your arm a little, which seems to tickle her. This causes her to loosen her grip and suddenly you are free.

You are filled with joy until you look down at what looks like a six story drop. The bind was what was keeping you from falling. You quickly latch onto her toe with your two hands. Your legs and the rest of your body are dangling over the edge as your arms hold on for dear life. You attempt to push yourself up or latch your feet unto the underside of her foot, but that tickles her and causes her to wiggle her toe up and down. You left arm looses it's grip as the wiggles. You have only seconds until imminent death.

"Okay, well I'll see you in a few minutes. I have something to show you that you'll like...Okay, bye now."

She hangs up the phone and brings her foot back down unto the ground. Now given your positioning underneath it, it lands on top of you.

"What are you doing there?!" she interrogates. "I told you to massage my feet, and you've been slacking off."

"I..." you protest, but that only makes her angrier.

"Now I have a friend to show you to, but I guess you'll also need a little punishment for talking back to me."

She picks you up with her toes and drops you into her heels. You fall downwards to the front and before you can climb out, she joins you. At first her toes slam you against the front wall, and then slowly slide you underneath them. With the smell and constant pressure, you don't think things could get much worse, but then she gets up and walks. Each step pushes her weight on top of you and soaks you in her sweat.

Does she take you directly to see her friend or does she take a detour first?
1143212221.title: The Careless Talker

choices: She went to the grocery store to get dinner.
She went to a store to get some toys for tonight.
11432122212.content:
She walks with you in her shoe. Each step is like thunder. You can't tell where she is going, though soon she reaches some kind of store. She purchases some items. You try to scream as she stands in line, hoping that others can hear you, but to no avail.

In a few minutes, she takes you out to show you what she got. Where did she go and what did she get?
11432122212.title: Need to Get Some Things Along the Way

choices: Wait it out, she might notice you.
11433.content:
Outside the backpack everything is going smoothly, the little girl and her mom are going through security while you are in the girl's backpack. The force of the book pressing against you feels like it's crushin you to death, the backpack goes through security without incident. However as the backpack is lifted up the book, you, and the snack fall down to he bottom of the bag, you still pinned in between during the fall. When you and the other objects hit the bottom, the force of the book falling behind you pushes you strait through the covering of the snack below you through a very thin tin covering and you are thrust into a very thick and slightly warm liquid.

Struggling to the surface through thick liquid you finally get to the surface and breath in as much air as you can, but something is off about the smell. After a while you realize that you've fallen strait through the top cover of a yogurt container and the hole 1 inch you made is barely noticable to anyone.
11433.title: Airplane snack

choices: "Yes sweety I'll get some out for you."
114331.content:
Waiting in the container is oddly soothing, the yogurt is somewhat warm and the container and the backpack muffle the sounds and block the light from outside. At first there is a lot of shaking and movement from outside but it soon stops, when you assume the girl got on he plane. Now all you have to wait for is for the girl to get hungry and open the yogurt and then hopefully notice you, hopefully.

After around an hour you've gotten used to life in a container of yogurt, all you can smell is a mix of yogurt and the girl's sweat because of her dirty shorts and t-shirt you see through the transparant container. You also realised how big the container is aswell, they must've had alot of yogurt they wanted to bring and just dumped it into the biggest container they could find. Around an hour later you hear loud muffled talkin from outside the bag, but you can't make anything out.

"Mommy can I have some yogurt as a snack?"
114331.title: Yogurt life

choices: The little girl, eagre to eat her snack!
The mother decided to eat it instead.

Plus you don’t want to think about what this woman would do to you if she caught you trying to escape. You sit and try to come to terms with your fate. You start crying thinking about how your as it as been is over. You just feel hopeless and powerless to do anything.

After three hours the woman comes back with a smile one her face.

“Good news Little one!” she says in a sing songy voice holding the jar to her face. “I found a buyer for you! I told you it wouldn’t take long.”

Before you can think of what to do next her hand comes into the jar and plucks you out with her thumb and index finger. She holds you up to her face. Her face is all you can see. You can’t help but think about how small you really are.

“Here’s the deal little guy” begins the woman. “You’re being sent to...”
1322322.title: She found a buyer

choices: Your captor drops you in the other woman’s  luggage.
The other woman scoops you up and traps you in her hand.
The other woman picks you up between her fingers.
133.content:
She puts her closed fist against her tummy and she starts walking. Every step she makes registers as loud booms in your tiny ears. She doesn’t hold you too tight and you can kind of make her out as she walks. You look up between her closed fingers you see that she looks like she’s in her late 20s and has long brown hair, she has average size breasts, she was also wearing a necklace that went just past her breasts, before she closed her hand on you you noticed she had big brown eyes, you also noticed her pale skin was flawless when she stared down at you, and she obviously uses some sort of lotion since the ride in her closed hand is soft and even somewhat pleasant.

After about five minutes of walking she stops.
“Did you get him?” Said a voice that sounded like it belonged to another woman.
“I sure did!” She said with excitement in her voice.

She opens up her hand revealing you in her palm. Before you can see who the other woman is...
133.title: She gives you to someone else.

choices: Jade takes her bag onto her plane
Jade puts her bag in her car
1331.content:
“Good” the other woman says. “And he fits my exact specifications?”

“Yes Jade.” Your original captor says confidently. “I really couldn’t believe my luck when I saw him.”

“Perfect. Good work Emily!” Jade says with excitement in her voice. “Here’s your payment. Now put him in here before someone sees what we’re doing.”

Suddenly you feel Emily’s hand move and drop you into some place dark. You free fall and land on a soft surface. You look up just in time to see a sliver of light before you see someone’s hand zip you up.

You feel where you are and you soon realize you’re on someone’s clothes. You move around a little and bump into what felt like a bra. Your heart sinks as you realize you’re in some woman’s luggage! You assume that it must be that woman named Jade’s luggage based on the conversation you heard.

Suddenly you feel a jolt and the sound of wheels on a hard surface and the steps of the two women walking. You know for sure you’re in a suitcase now. You can hear the muffled voices of the two women responsible for your kidnapping. Eventually the talking stops and you can hear a pair of footsteps getting fainter and fainter.

“Emily must be gone” you say to yourself.

You figure all you can do now if plot a potential escape attempt and wonder what this Jade wants with you and wonder why she wanted someone who looks like you.

What happens next?
1331.title: Carried away

choices: She just does her business and goes on her way.
Something else, like maybe someone steals her luggage (use your imagination)
13312.content:
The world moves as she wheels the suitcase you’re in throughout the airport. The thunderous clank from her heeled shoes announce each of her steps. You hear the familiar scanning noises as she goes through security. For some reason, they don’t seem to notice you at all: maybe they think you’re some kind of doll or toy from the sensors.

You hear her buy some lunch at the food court and head over to her gate. She’s taken a detour in the bathroom, and you hear her open and close the stall door.
13312.title: Carry-On

choices: Rich and can afford some fun.”
A dealer: transporting you for someone else.”
A model, specializing in a certain kind of apparel.”
133121.content:
You hear an unzipping noise, and light floods your world. A hand reaches straight for you. You instinctively try to dive into the bra next to you to hide, but you’re not quick enough. It grabs you by your leg and dangles you outside.

Once outside, her fingers places you onto the palm of her other hand and lifts you to her face. In front of you is a tall and skinny black woman. She has medium length braided hair, up in a bun on top of her head. She’s absolutely gorgeous. You know she can’t mean well because she’s kidnapped you, but in another setting, you’d find her incredibly attractive. She’s sitting on the toilet, but you can tell by the fact that her pants are up, that she didn’t have to go.

“Hello, I’m Jade,” she introduces. “I figured I would take a better look at you where no one else would see us.”

“Where am I, and why am I so small?” you demand.

“Hmm, I guess it makes sense that you’re getting used to this situation,” she bemuses. “I’m…
133121.title: Acquainted

choices: Try to get help from someone (like do you have your phone?)
1331213.content:
“Hmm, I guess it makes sense that you’re getting used to this situation,” Jade bemuses. “I’m a model, specializing in a certain kind of apparel. I need tiny people with a certain look and feel to match my outfits. I sent one of my assistants to find someone at the airport, and you, young sir,” poking you playfully with her index finger while saying this and inadvertently knocking you over not knowing her strength, “will match the ensemble perfectly.”

“Ensemble?” you reply, too dumbfounded by the rest of her statement to make sense of it yet.

“Yes, you’ll see in time. Don’t worry.” She continues. “You’ve already got acquainted with some of it.” She points to the clothes in her luggage, and you notice that the clothes you’ve been lying on top of are ornate clothing items.

“We’re headed back to New York for the shoot.”

“New York? Why did you come here to find someone then?” you ask.

“Oh I have to do a lot of travel for work, and well, it’s best not to shrink people in the same city, since it’s easier to track then.”

“You’ve got to let me go. I have a life!” you demand back.

“I guess you did, but don’t worry,” she responds. “I need you. Plus, even if I didn’t, I can’t be implicated by having you go free: I’d have to dispose of you to cover my tracks.”

“Wait, is that what you want to do with when you’re done?” you stammer.

“Oh don’t worry. A fine fellow like you, I’ll need for a while. We’ll cross that bridge if we ever get to it,” she explains, winking. “But don’t worry about that. I took you out to give you some food. It’s going to be a long flight. Take this for now.”

She hands you a grape and small piece of cheese from her lunch: some kind of Greek salad. The weight of the grape almost knocks you over, but you can tell she’s waiting for you to eat in her presence. You hesitantly do: the grape squirts in your face when you first dig your face into it. This causes her to giggle and shake her hand slightly. You only eat half of each. She immediately grabs the rest of the grape and cheese and plop it into her mouth. You wince as she chews something about the size of your head like it wasn’t a thing.

After you’re done, she places you back into the cup of her bra in her suitcase and zips it back up.

“Enjoy the flight, and I’ll see you in a few hours,” she calls as she zips it up. You hear her get up and walk to her flight, trapped amidst the folds of her clothes.
1331213.title: Fashion Item

choices: You land in New York without incident
Jade takes you out of her suitcase mid flight
You are startled by sudden movement
13312132.content:
You hear the suitcase roll on the floor and the loud booms that Jade makes with every step in her high heels. You hear her humming a tune to herself as you are carried away from your previous life to an uncertain fate. After about five minutes, the rolling stops as Jade makes it to her gate. You can hear the boarding call for her flight to New York. She seemed to have timed her arrival perfectly to her gate.

Before long Jade makes it to her plane. You feel a sudden shift as she puts her suitcase into the overhead bin. Your heart sinks as you hear the door to the bin shut. You know there’s no escape now. All you can do is wait.

You hear the flight attendant giving safety instructions for the flight. You soon hear the sound of the aircraft’s powerful jets lifting the plane into the air. You can’t help but be terrified. You’ve been kidnapped by a model who wants to use you for god knows what.

You keep wondering what she meant by you “fitting in to her ensemble”. You figure it can’t mean anything good. Especially since Jade has no intention of letting you go.

You figure you’ll find out soon enough. In the meantime you try to collect yourself and get some rest.


What happens next?
13312132.title: Wait it out.

choices: Jade takes you out of the bag
Jade meets a friend at the airport
Jade gets into a taxi and goes to the studio
133121321.content:
Jade was right, it is going to be a long flight. New York was on the opposite side of the country from where you were supposed to be flying. Luckily for you Jade’s clothes in her suitcase are soft. You easily make an improvised bed and pillow and try to relax. Despite all the chaos that just happened, you fall asleep.

You dream that you are normal size again and you’re attending your college graduation which is expected to be in a few months. You’re so excited to get your diploma and start your new life as a college graduate. Just as the president of the University is about to hand you your diploma your vision goes black.

Sure enough, you wake up and you’re in pitch blackness again. The aircraft had landed in New York and the sudden jolt of Jade grabbing her suitcase ruined the wonderful dream you were having.

You’re snapped back into reality and fear begins to set in as Jade takes her luggage and starts carrying you through the airport. You’re absolutely petrified thinking about what’s going to happen next and how you’re going to be used by this model.

What happens next?
133121321.title: You land in New York without incident

choices: Jade takes you out again before you can make a call
13312133.content:
You don’t really know what Jade meant by making you apart of her ensemble but you don’t want to find you. Hoping that your cellphone shrunk along with the rest of you you reach into your pocket.

As luck would have it your phone shrunk too. You know you don’t have much time before Jade gets on her plane and you won’t be able to call for help. You dial the first number that comes to mind.

What number is it?
13312133.title: A sliver of hope

choices: She knows, and she’s in on it
133121331.content:
You met Lizzie during this school year. You’ve only been dating for five months but she’s as never let you down before. You figure she’d be the best person to call, she’s the one who dropped you off so chances are she’s the closest one to the airport out of all the people you know.

You press her number on your list of contacts and wait for her to pick up.

“Hi sweetie” you hear her say. “Did you make it on your flight yet?”

“Not exactly” you say quietly. “I know this will sound crazy but shortly after you dropped me off some strange woman shrunk me and handed me off to her friend who’s a model! She said she wants to use me in a photo shoot but she also plans to not let me go. So, I've been kidnapped and I’m in her luggage and she’s walking to her plane which is probably heading to New York! Please honey, you have to help me!”

How does Lizzie respond?

133121332.content:
You immediately think of the airport police. They always have safety announcements over the intercom every ten minutes with their phone number to report suspicious activity. You dial the number as fast as you can and impatiently wait for someone to pick up as you’re carried through the airport.

“Port of Portland Police” you hear after what seems like forever.

“You have to help me!” You say quietly so Jade can’t hear you. “I was shrunk by some woman and handed off to a model who kidnapped me for some sort of photo shoot. I’m in her luggage and she’s probably on her way to a flight heading for New York! Please help!”

There’s a moment of silence and the person on the other line finally speaks.

What do they say?

The other woman scoops you up in her hand before you have a chance to get a good look at her. She presses you snuggly against her palm, enough to immobilize you but not enough to hurt you.

With her one hand still firmly pinning you in darkness, the woman grabs a gun and shrinks her colleague.

She grabs the little woman with her other hand and decides what to do next.
133211.title: Shrunken Trafficker

choices: Someone or something else stops the fight.
1332112.content:
She drops both of you into a shoe-box size crate, closing it before you can see anyone. Some light comes in, and you notice a fabric bed, a piece of food, and a thimble for a toilet. You don’t have time to inspect any of these as the box starts to move.

“Add one more woman shrinkee to the order,” your captress states to someone you can’t see. “One less person to shrink before we get going.”

Someone carries the box and drops it harshly onto a pallet, causing your world to quake.

You turn to the woman, “Who are you, and what the fuck is happening?”

“We shrink people to sell on the black market. Very lucrative money.”

You are enraged at what she did to you and your current situation, but almost too angry to do anything but ask questions.

“Who do you sell shrunken people to?”

“Mostly to establishments around the world that cater to uhh tiny demands,” she states processing this herself. She never had to think about the operation from the perspective of the caged.

“Establishments?”

“Yeah, they rent out little people to use as toys.”

“Are you saying that we are going to one of these?”

“Well sometimes, rich individuals also order some shrinkees for their personal collections, but usually it’s to one these establishments.”

“You bitch,” you shout, jumping on top of her, but she seems to know some kind of martial arts and repels you back.
1332112.title: The Crate

choices: You guys are going to one of these establishments.
You are going to a private collector.

“Listen. I dislike this predicament as much as you do, but right now, there’s nothing we can do about it.” She sits in the corner of the room, while you cool down. You still want to wring her throat but know you cannot.

“Where is this shipment going?” You eventually ask.

“I don’t know. I was only a collector. I didn’t oversee shipments. They delineate the tasks so that if I became compromised, I couldn’t give away key information.”

You sulk trying to decide what to do. A few more boxes land on top of you causing your world to shake. Eventually, they seat the pallet leaving you in darkness.

“I will have to give you to him since you’re the only person he’s seen.” the woman says
“Really??” your first captress says with obvious excitement in her voice. “What do you want me to do with him?”
“Do whatever you want with him as long as he doesn’t escape.” Your second captress instructs “if he escapes I will hold you responsible”

The woman who originally caught you closes her hand and drops you in her purse. She doesn’t want to risk anyone seeing you. She zips up her purse but leaves it a tiny bit open to allow fresh air in and she starts walking. Inside her purse you try not do get crushed by her makeup and her wallet. Eventually, you find a nice piece of cloth to lay on that isn’t in the direct path of anything that could crush you.

As the woman keeps walking you realize you’re leaving the airport. You hear her getting into her car. She sets her purse down on the passgener seat. As she drives you can’t help but worry about what’s going to happen to you. She seemed pretty excited to have possession of you and said that she wanted to keep you. So you were relieved that she probably wasn’t going to kill you. Still, you wondered what she meant by always wanting a tiny man. You hoped that she didn’t have any menevolent plans for you.

Eventually, after about 30 minutes of driving the car stopped and you felt the sudden motion of the woman picking up her purse with you inside. “Well hello there, cutie.” she said “did you enjoy the ride in my purse? I hope it wasn’t too uncomfortable”

You tell her your name and she continues smiling at you in her cupped hands
“My name is Emily” she said with peppy voice
