However, since I let you see my face when I caught you, my boss said we couldn’t sell you because you’re not supposed to see who captured you. Because of this my boss told me that I could have you. I have to admit, I did that on purpose because you were just so cute and I wanted you for myself.” With that she gave you a playful poke.

Trying to comprehend all what she just told you you managed to say in a nervious voice “w-what are you going to do to me?”

“Well...” Emily started to say in a flirtatious tone “I was thinking you could be my...”

“Hee hee, that tickles!” Emily giggles as she pats her stomach. In horror you realize that to her, you fighting for your life just registers as a satisfying tickle. You then feel slight pressure coming from outside Emily’s stomach. You realize she’s gleefully rubbing it. She’s really enjoying your struggle.

After about 10 minutes of struggling you start to feel weak. All you can do is just sit in Emily’s stomach and gradually lose your energy as her stomach acid gradually sucks the life out of you.

“He was so tasty!” you hear Emily say. She then lets out a petite burp and continues with her day.

You meanwhile, lose consciousness after about an hour. You don’t know it at the time but you will never wake up again. You then become nothing more than nutrients for Emily’s body as your remains make their way through her small intestine and bloodstream.

Meanwhile as you are being digested. Emily met up with her friend that had scolded her earlier.

“So what did you do to him?” she asked.

“He’s in my stomach now if you want to say hello” she said with satisfied smile.

“Good Thinking!” Her friend said. “Now there are no witnesses to our operation”

“Yes, plus he was the tastiest little thing I’ve ever eaten!” Emily said joyfully. “You should give me shrinkees more often”

The two women laughed and walked off together.

A few days pass and you are fully digested. The only evidence that you ever existed is a piece of fat on Emily’s tummy.

“You can’t just..!”

Before you can finish your sentence you are dropped into Emily’s luggage and zipped up. You land on some soft material which you assume are clothes. You gulp in fear as you hear one of them put a lock on it.

You feel a sudden jolt as Emily starts rolling her luggage through the airport. You hear the muffled voices of the two women as they make their way to the check in counter. There’s a sudden shift as you are put on a conveyer belt. Gradually their voices get softer and softer and all your left with is the sound of the conveyer belt moving you through the airport.

Knowing that airport security scans all checked bags before being loaded onto the plane you jump up and down and wave your arms around hoping to be noticed when you hear the voices of airport security scanning bags with their x-ray.

Are you noticed?
1332212.title: Emily’s luggage

13322122.content:
“Hey, look at this” you hear a muffled voice say.

You hope that they’re referring to you.

“It looks like a tiny person is trapped in this bag going through the X-ray” the voice continues

“Ha! Good one, that’s just a doll” you hear another voice say. “Send it through”

You’re heart sinks as the voices get fainter and fainter. You sadly sit on the pile of clothes in the bag thinking about how that was your only chance of being rescued. Suddenly, you feel the conveyor belt stop as someone takes the suitcase you’re in and loads it onto a truck. Soon you’re being taken out to the aircraft and you feel a sudden change in angles as you’re loaded into the plane’s cargo hold.

Not long after you can hear the plane’s powerful jets thrusting the aircraft into the sky. You can’t help but wonder what’s going to happen to you when you arrive and what this woman Emily and Kathleen are selling you to is going to do with you. Even more so, you wonder in fear where you’re being taken to.

After a while you realize that whoever you’re being sold to lives really far away as the flight is already over six hours long. With nothing to do but wait you try to get some sleep. After another hour you eventually doze off.

After what didn’t seem like a long time you are woken up by a sudden thud. You soon realize that you’ve landed. Feeling nervous about your inevitable fate you quiver in fear as you hear baggage handlers removing bags from the plane.

It isn’t long until they get to your bag and you’re hoisted onto a truck bound for the baggage claim. You feel your world shift once again as you are placed on another conveyor belt which you assume is the baggage claim.

You realize that you guessed correctly when you hear the familiar muffled voices of Kathleen and Emily. There’s a sudden jolt as Emily grabs her suitcase off the conveyor belt. As you’re being carried through the airport you can hear the loud booms of Emily’s and Kathleen’s footsteps.

Suddenly, you hear a loud speaker in another language. You’ve always been good with languages and dialects and you realize you’re in...
13322122.title: Bad luck

134.content:
You take a good look at the giant woman who shrank you from in her hand, even with her fist closed. The woman looked like she was in her late 20s and had bright blood red hair. She wore a pair of blue sunglasses and had a tattoo of some sort over her left eye. She was also very fat, you'd say at least 400lbs with a bulging belly that made her pink tank top look painted on and a massive butt that looked as wide as she was tall and was covered in black pants. The giantess takes you to a corner where nobody could see either of you and opens her hand as she smiles down at the inch high shrunken man. "Fee-Fi-Fo-Fum." She says with a giggle. You look at her and groan. "Sorry," says the fat giantess. "Couldn't resist." "Why are you doing this to me?" you ask. You then grunt because the giantess puts one of her fingers over your mouth and smirks as she wiggles her big butt.

"Uh, uh, uh," says the giant redhead. "I'll tell you in due time. But first we have to get to our spot. The giantess reveals that she has several purple and polka-dotted carry-on bags and giggles as she lifts one up and unzips it. You look in worry and then the giant lady tilts her hand, causing you to slip and fall screaming into the bag. You land with a grunt on several shirts that looked too tight to fit on this giant lady and look up to see nothing but her smug face looking down on you.

After you've fallen into her carry-on bag, the giantess zips you in and takes her luggage away as she hums to herself. You look around the mess of clothes and see that with the place zipped up, it's almost too dark to see. You can see several books the woman brought, all of which by big name authors as well as what looks like a rather large makeup kit. What you don't see is anything that could've been used to shrink you. You're guessing that she most likely wouldn't keep it in the same place she would keep a shrunken victim, if she even still had it on her.

Suddenly you feel motion and hold on tight to one of the giantess's shirts as the carry-on bag you're on is placed with the others on a cart. You hear rolling and gulp before the luggage is put away in the cargo hold of the giant woman's plane. It isn't long before you hear an engine sound and the plane takes off. You've rode in planes before but always as a passenger. It was a scary thought that you were an inch tall and riding in a giant woman's suitcase. Speaking of which, that obese scarlet-haired giant was already in her seat (or rather both her seats given how large she was) and calmly listening to headphones as she is no doubt thinking on what she's going to do with you next.

As you wait in the bag with the giant woman's clothes, you begin to wonder to yourself "This woman shrank me," you think. "A total stranger, yet that big cow shrank me so small she could carry a dozen of me in her mouth. But why did she do it? Heck, how did she shrink me? Who is this giantess?" You sit down on a novel that had to weigh as much as a phonebook and think of three possibilities on who this monstrous behemoth lady was and what she wanted with you.

"Maybe this woman is a witch," you think to yourself. "Maybe she's a sorceress, perhaps hundreds of years old, who shrank me with a powerful magic spell. Oh my. If she is a witch and she's that powerful, maybe I'm not the first of her victims. For all I know, she could have dozens of shrunken victims in her other suitcases." You shiver at that idea but then you come up with another possibility.

"But on the opposite end of the spectrum," you think. "That soda I drank earlier tasted funny. Maybe that woman is a mad scientist who created some kind of strange formula meant to turn people like me into insects. Maybe she needed to make sure that it worked and used me as a guinea pig as a plot to take over the world. Oh, I hope that isn't the case." You kick back and suck your thumb just thinking about the red-haired giantess laughing as she stomped an entire city, dressed as a queen. "That would be horrible," you say to yourself. "I hope I'm not right about that theory."

Suddenly a spark came to you. "I did see that giantess wearing a bunch of jewelry. She could be rich. That's it. This giant woman who shrank me, could very well be a wealthy businesswoman. Maybe she runs a big company that just developed a shrinking ray and she chose me to test it out on! That's it. Maybe she's gone into the business of selling shrunken humans, developing shrinking technology for warfare or maybe she's simply planning to shrink all her employees to save on costs." You bite your nails. None of the possibilities of who this strange giantess was or how she shrank you sounded pleasant to you and you were afraid of what the giant fat lady was going to do to you when she arrived. You worry so much that you scream and pass out.

By the time you wake you, you hear that the plane has landed and then you gulp as the giant fat redhead lady was walking up to pick up her luggage with you inside. Unbeknownst to you, you were now in...
134.title: In the Giantess's Luggage

choices: “My friend always wanted a tiny man. You’re going to be her new pet.”
“I’m a witch and you’re going to be my cute little pet.”
“I wanted to have my favorite snack after the end of a long flight.”
1342.content:
You feel motion as the fat beautiful giantess picks up her bag with you inside it. As she carries it through the Terminal you hear announcments over the intercom in a foreign language. You immediately recognize it as French. You then realize that you’re in Paris which would explain the long flight. The woman leaves the airport in a taxi for her hotel near the Effel Tower. When she arrives in her room her gently sets her bag with you inside on the bed. She unzips it and plucks you out of your carrier and holds you in her cubby palm and holds you up to her face.
“Hello” she says with a sly grin on her face “My name is Zoey. How did you enjoy the ride?”

“Hi” you say nervously “It was ok considering that i was in your bag. Now are you going to tell me why you kidnapped me?”
Zoey’s response is....
1342.title: Paris

choices: We got to get going to meet her.”
13421.content:
“My friend could use a pet, so I figured I would get her one during my visit.”

You are aghast, “A pet! I can’t be a pet. I’m a person.”

“Were a person. Don’t worry being a pet is easy. You just have to obey everything she says, or don’t. It really doesn’t matter. She’ll pretty easily put you in check.” She stated, poking you with her finger suggestively and knocking you over.

“Why did you shrink me in the U.S. just to fly me here?”

“If I can help it, it’s best to shrink people in a different country than where you are going. It’s less local that way and less traceable.”

“What the fuck; you can’t do…” she slams her finger against your face, shutting you up and pressing your face against her palm.

“I can do whatever I want with you, little guy.” She presses her finger down onto your whole body to make her point. She starts to rub her finger up and down your body simultaneously causing you pain and turning you on. “Or I guess she can do whatever she wants. Do you understand?”

You try to shout yes, but it’s only a muffled gurgle. She lifts her pressure.

“Good. Man I need to get another one of you guys for myself! It’s been a while. Anyways,…
13421.title: Gifted to a Friend

choices: Fatimah comes back the following morning drunk and goes straight to bed without
She gets home slightly loosened from the alcohol and wanting some fun with you.
It’s still the middle of the night, and both Fatimah and her friend come back ho
134211.content:
“We got to get going to meet her. You’ll like her. She’s in kind of a unique situation.”

She places you in a small jewelry box and closes and drops you into her purse.

She books a taxi to her friend’s place who is waiting on the steps for her. You hear as they greet each other and exchange warm hugs.

“How are you, Fatima?” your captress asks her friend.

“I’m doing okay, all told,” her friends responds. “Thank you so much for being willing to come out here.”

“No problem. It was on my way. I only wish I could stay more than a night, but with work, I just can’t…”

“I understand. You have a busy schedule.”

“But with everything going on with you, I knew it was important to get here as soon as I could. You seem better than when we talked over the phone.”

“Yeah,” The friend responds, pausing for a long time. “I am. I’m still depressed, though, but I think that was the worst of it.”

“That makes perfect sense. Geez, your husband left you, and you got fired on the same week. Of course that takes time.” Her friend only responded with a quiet hmm as it she was hesitant to acknowledge that. “Your husband was a cheating asshole, and maybe it was time for a brighter job anyways.”

“That’s helpful.”

“I also brought something for you.” You feel her rummage through her purse and grab the box you’re in out. “Here’s a little gift for you.”

“You didn’t have to.”

“It’s fine.”

“No seriously, jewelry doesn’t really help right now.”

“No silly, it’s not jewelry. That’s just the box. Open it!”

You feel the box handed off and feel the top open. Above you stands a woman of normal to slightly skinny build in her thirties, of maybe Algerian or Moroccan descent, black slightly curly hair down to her neck and large hazel eyes. Fatima looks pretty, except that life had sucked the energy out of her.

“I’m not really in the mood for one of your snacks,” Fatima states, looking up at her friend.

“Not this time. I got him for you as a little pet… or a companion… to help you get back on your feet.”

“I don’t know…”

“You need a little company hun.”

“It’s just a lot.”

“You’re depressed. I get it. Such a thing takes a little time to process, but trust me, he’ll help you as you build yourself back together. I needed a few when my husband and I divorced.”

“I don’t know,” Fatimah replies, handing the box back to her.

“Ok, how about this,” your original captress suggests grabbing the box. “Let’s leave him on the mantel here.” As she says this, she walks over to the fireplace and dumps you nonchalantly onto the mantel above it next to a set of pictures. “Let’s hang out and catch tonight. Give it a day or two to think it over and then decide whether you want him. If not, just send him back to me.”

“Okay, it’s just that I never had a little person like that.”

“Just because it’s new doesn’t mean it’s bad, but forget about that for now. Let’s hang out. I leave for my flight by 6:00 am, but let’s go hit a few bars and open you up. Drinks are on me”

They leave as they go paint the town red, leaving you stuck on the mantel.

After a few hours in silence...
134211.title: Meet her Friend

choices: She got so drunk she forgot about you.
She brings you over to decide what to do with you.
1342111.content:
You eventually fall asleep lying in darkness despite the hardness of the wood. You wake to hear Fatimah come in. She staggers through the doorway, hammered and goes straight upstairs into her room. The noises go away as you assume she passes out on her bed.

You drift back to sleep, waking in the morning. You wait, stranded on the mantel until you hear your new “owner” come down the stairs well past noon. Her hair disheveled, wearing the same clothes from the day before, hungover. She goes straight into the kitchen to grab some food and drink. With a cup of coffee and a plate full of something, she walks out, distraught by the brightly lit combined living and dining where you have been and sits down at her dining room table to eat.
1342111.title: The Next Morning

choices: She comes back with your new home, among other things.
You manage to escape the mantel.
13421111.content:
She doesn’t even look up at you as she eats her breakfast. Within a few seconds, she finishes and wisps herself back upstairs, not even bothering to put her plate away or to finish her coffee. The shower is running for about 40 minutes, and you hear her blow dry her hair and apply make-up. After about an hour, she comes back down to put her plate in the sink.

“Hey,” you shout. “Excuse me!”

“Oh hey,” she stammers. “I had forgotten about you. Long night.”

She leaves for the kitchen and comes back with a cookie. “Here,” she presents it. She sizes you up. She doesn’t seem to want to harm you yet relatively indifferent to your well-being.

“You’ve got to help me. Bring me to the authorities so I can go back home to the U.S.”

“And get my friend arrested. No that’s not an option. I guess I could use a little pet, but right now, I have a few errands to run. Stay put for now, and when I get back, I will set up a little home for you.”

Before you have time to respond, she grabs her purse, walks out the door. You eat a bit of the cookie, about as twice as large, eating your fill. Then you wait for several hours, trapped on the mantel wish no choice but to wait until she gets back.
13421111.title: Memory Log

choices: Give you back to my friend.”
13421112.content:
“Hey there,” she calls over to you, as she walks over and cusps you with her hand. She places you onto the table next to her plate. “Here, do you want some food?”

On her plate is a breakfast croissant, a few pieces of fruit, and some yogurt. She rips a piece of croissant for you, and you accept gladly.

“My name is Fatimah. What’s yours?”

“Michael.”

“How did you get so small?”

“She just shrunk me out of the blue; I didn’t do anything. Please you got to help me get help and get home.”

“Where are you from?”

“The United States.”

“I see.”

“Please take me to the police or the embassy. They can get me back to my family.”

“I can’t do that. That would get my friend in trouble. She was only trying to help me.”

“Please.”

“No,” she retorted firmly. “But I do need to figure out what to do with you. She’s right that you could keep me company, and you seem like low maintenance for a pet, definitely easier than say a puppy. Plus, I don’t really want to kill an innocent life and getting rid of you otherwise would be a hassle.”

You try to protest, but she simply walks to the other room. She comes back with a second cup of coffee.

“I’ve made my decision, and I am going to…”
13421112.title: What to do with you

choices: You accept your place as Fatimah’s pet
You try to make a run for it
134211121.content:
“I will keep you” she decides. “My friend is right, I could use some company after all the crap that has just happened to me. Besides you’re a cute little thing” she says playfully poking you.

“But I can’t stay with you, I have my own life back home” you protest.

“Well now you have a new life. You’re mine now, but don’t worry I will take good care of you.” Fatimah says in a non threatening voice. “The truth is, I’m extremely lonely and I would really like a pet. I know it isn’t ideal for you for be this tiny, but I will take care of you and protect you.”

You think about it for a little bit. She seems like a nice woman who could use some company. But she also seems like someone who would be a little too overprotective and not let you leave if you wanted to. It’s not like you have a choice in the matter any way but you think that if you went a long with it, at least for a little while it would be less hard for you. Finally you decide your stance on your predicament.
134211121.title: Fatimah keeps you

1342111211.content:
“I guess I can be your pet” you say unsure of the words you just uttered.

“Well, it’s not like you had a choice” Fatimah said in a smug tone. “But I’m glad you agree, it’ll make the transition easier for you.”

“So, what exactly does being your pet mean for me?” You say in a noticeablely nervous voice.

Noticing how frightened you are Fatimah gently picks you up with her thumb and index finger and places you in her hand. She then starts gently petting you with her index finger.

“I want you to be my tiny little companion” she said. “You will come with me wherever I go. Of course I don’t want anyone to know I have you so you’ll most likely have to ride in my purse or bra when I go out.”

“What about sleeping? Will I have to sleep on the hard counter?” You asked

“Of course not” Fatimah said with a laugh. “I will make a bed for you on my dresser right next to my bed. I will also make sure you get enough to eat”

With that, she holds you up to her face and gives a soft kiss. Her lips cover your entire body. You’re covered in a thin layer of saliva. Noticing this Fatimah gently blows you dry.

“Hmm” you think “maybe being her pet might not be so bad.” In the back of your mind you still think of escaping but you can’t help but also think about how kind Fatimah is being to you and how much in need of a friend she is.

“Well Little guy.” She says “Zoey leaves soon and I need to go say goodbye to her. I’m going to...”
1342111211.title: Accepting your fate

13421112112.content:
“I’m going to take you with me” Fatimah said. “Like I said, you’re my pet and I’m going to take you everywhere with me. Besides, I’m sure she’ll want to say goodbye to you.”

With that Fatimah picks you up and gently puts you in her purse and walks out of her home. She leaves it open so you can see everything. Every now and then she looks down at you and smiles at you in an endearing way.

You meanwhile, are jostled around her purse and successfully avoid being hit by verious loose items in her purse like tubs of lipstick and perfume.

After about 20 minutes of walking you stop at what looks like a small cafe. Fatimah sets her purse in her lap and waits for her friend. While she’s waiting she sticks her finger down in her purse and pets you on the top of your head. After about 5 minutes of this you hear Zoey arrive.

“Hi Fatimah!” She says. “It’s so nice of you to see me off before I have to catch my flight home.”

“No problem.” Fatimah replies. “You don’t get to come here often so i wanted to say goodbye to you properly.”

“So, how do you like the little man?” Zoey asks with a smile in her voice.

“I love him” Fatimah says with new found life in her voice. You realize she seems much happier than the first time you saw her. “He’s such a cutie, he will make a great pet for me. Thank you so much.”

“Awww, I just knew you’d love him!” Zoey said with excitement. “I knew he’d be perfect for you when I saw him. May I see him? I want to say goodbye.”

“Of course, he’s in my purse.”

A second later you see a giant hand coming into your carrier. Soon you’re plucked out of Fatimah’s purse and placed on Zoey’s chubby palm. She smiles at you and give you a kiss.

“Goodbye little guy” she says “You should consider yourself lucky I’m not keeping you” she says as licks her lips and winks at you.

You gulp in fear as you watch her lick her lips at you.

“Zoey! You’re scaring him!” Fatimah says taking you from Zoey’s hand.

“Relax, I’m just having fun with him.” Zoey said.

“I know, but he’s just a little thing. You shouldn’t scare him like that.” Fatimah says as she starts petting you.

You role your eyes a bit at how much you’re being babied.

“I better put him back in my purse before someone sees him.” Fatimah said “say goodbye to Aunt Zoey little guy.”

You reluctantly wave goodbye. Zoey waves back and blows you a kiss.

With that she puts you back in her purse. The two woman continue to chat for a bit. Eventually Fatimah hugs Zoey goodbye. You are startled by the sudden motion of Fatimah picking up her purse. You again are jostled about amongst loose items before finally finding a safe place in the corner of her purse.

What happens next?
13421112112.title: Saying goodbye to Zoey

choices: You refuse: you have a line, and this is it.
You try it on, but being forced to gets to you.
You try it on and just swallow the humiliation.
134211121122.content:
You listen passively as she walks through the mall. Sometimes she walks briskly, and sometimes she stops and slowly paces as if browsing around a store. You are left in the dark (literally) only able to guess at what she’s doing.

Eventually, she sets her purse down, lets the light shine in on you by unzipping her purse, and takes you out. She plops you onto a large bench next to her in what appears to be a changing room. She plops a few doll-sized clothing items in front of you.

“I have a few outfits for you to try on,” she explains. “You’re current attire will get worn quickly if it’s the only clothes we have for you.”

You look reluctantly at the clothes she’s laid out in front of you. The first outfit is a miniaturized polo and khaki pants that the Ken doll frequently wear. She looks down at you expectantly. You don’t want to do this though, but seeing her waiting face, you realize it might be easiest to just comply. You take off your clothes and put it on. It fits but is stiff: they cut the clothes for a barbie, not an actual tiny human, so it tugs at you while you try to walk around. She marvels at it, making you realize that it’s going to be a keeper.

The next outfit is a campy sailor costume: a white hat, synchronized navy blue shirt and pants, and a white neckerchief to match the hat. You gasp at it and really don’t want to put it on. She points at it insistently.
134211121122.title: A Few New Outfits

choices: She decides to let you be for a little while.
She insists you keep trying on more outfits.
1342111211222.content:
You again realize that you don’t have much of a choice and try it on. She squeals in delight at you as you look across the room into the giant mirror.

You look like a doll or action figure, huddled in an over-the-top outfit as your giant owner giggles down at you. Suddenly the emotions of the everything that happened hit you. You don’t know why this outfit of things ended up being the camel-breaking straw, but all the bent in emotions from the last few days just burst out at you at that moment. It hits you that you are just a toy with toy clothes, and the life you once knew was totally gone.

You kneel into the fetal position and cry uncontrollably. Fatimah tries to tap on your shoulder to talk to you, but every time, you just ignore her. There’s nothing for you now.
1342111211222.title: Straw the Broke the Camel's Back

1342111212.content:
"Why are you guys the only ones who get to make decisions on me? What if I don't want to end up as a pet to some stranger in a foreign country? What if I want to be returned to normal and sent home? I didn't ask for any of this!" You cry out, hoping that Fatimah would listen to your cries for freedom and have mercy on you. Unfortunately, the face she was giving you wasn't one of pity, and you were about to find out how she really felt about your desire to be set free.

"Listen here pipsqueak, you don't get to make decisions because we don't listen to people who fit in our purses. You are this height for the rest of your life now, and you better get used to it. Just because you even had the audacity to back talk me, I'm going to teach you a lesson." The tan skinned giantess then reached down to her feet and slipped off one of her moccasins. You were immediately grabbed and thrown onto the ground, to where you were now facing down the gigantic sole of your owner, and nearly went into shock.

The smell wasn't that bad, but she had a good amount of sweat underneath her feet as she ordered you to start licking. You stared at the toes that were out of your reach, bouncing around in anticipation as this French girl was finally about to experience what her friend had no doubt told her all about when it came to dominating a tiny person.

You inched closer, not wanting to touch the smooth soles of this giant, but she soon grew tired of waiting and brought her foot closer, slamming it into your body, pressing you against the warm skin of her foot. You got to work, taking your tongue out and against everything that your mind was telling you, started to lick. You could taste the slight sweat that her foot had amassed as you rubbed your tongue all over this titan's sole.

This went on for some time, with you constantly wanting to gag, but the fear of what she would do to you if you had the audacity to even try held you in check, and you continued with your task that Fatimah had set you on. About ten minutes after you had started, the giantess reached down and plucked you from her toes, and brought you back up to her face.

"See, that wasn't that bad!" Fatimah laughed, looking at your terrified face at about the size of a penny, and under her complete control. As to reward you, she pulled you in to her face, right in front of her bright red lips, to which puckered up and gave a sloppy kiss, even a little bit of tongue poking it's way out of her mouth to grace you.

"Now, little guy I'm going to
1342111212.title: Resistance Is Futile

choices: “I’m going to keep him for myself”
“I will have him for a snack later”
134211122.content:
“Nothing personal little guy, but I don’t really think it would be a good idea to keep you as a pet. I don’t really have the money to accommodate a pet. Plus you would probably try to escape and it seems like more of a hassle than it’s worth.” she says. “I’m going to give you back to my friend, let her have you.”

Suddenly, there’s a knock on the door.

“Hello!” It’s Zoey, the woman who kidnapped you. “So, how do you like him?” She asked

“Honestly, I don’t really think I want a pet right now. It just seems like too much trouble” Fatimah said

“I understand” Zoey says as she scoops you up in her hand. “I just wanted to give you the option of having a little guy to be your pet. I don’t have to leave for a little bit, would you like to talk for a bit?

“Sure” Fatima says with a smile in her voice

Zoey casually drops you in her purse and zips it up, dashing any hopes of escape. You sit in total darkness for a few hours listening to the two of them talk about everything from clothes to their favorite books. Finally you hear Zoey say:

“Well, I should get going. It was great seeing you again.”

You then hear Fatimah ask: “what’s going to happen to the tiny man?”

You were hoping she would say that she would take you home and unshrink you. Instead she says...
134211122.title: Back to your original captress

choices: you've got nothing, you're doomed to be Zoe's snack
you've found something in the purse or come up with a plan to buy yourself time
1342111223.content: Upon hearing that you sit bolt upright in Zoe's purse, you were now not just shrunk and kidnapped but this crazy woman was going to eat you for a snack! You began sprinting around the purse, stumbling in the dark but desperate for anything that could help you. You can hear that the two giantesses are still talking outside but your focus is on how you can escape them, but their conversation wont last forever and Zoe has places to be. By the time the conversation wraps up and Zoe starts getting ready to leave...
1342111223.title: “I will have him for a snack later”

13423.content: Your jaw dropped as you heard her response, this woman was seriously going to eat you. You struggled wildly but she was too big, there was nothing you could do as Zoe raised you above her head, she opened her mouth and shook you playfully as she dangled you over her gaping maw. You opened your mouth to beg but just as you did Zoe let go of your little body and you plummeted downward. With a wet smack you slammed onto her massive tongue, you scrambled to escape her mouth but her lips slammed shut in front of you. The massive tongue rose up beneath you and you heard Zoe giggle happily as she thoroughly tasted you and tossed you around her mouth with her tongue. What’s going on?
1352232121112.title: To Olivia’s apartment

“You will ride in my checked luggage for the flight” Chelsea announced.

“You can’t just..”

Before you could finish your sentence Chelsea drops you into her bag and sealed you in. Your heart sinks you hear her put a lock on it. There was no way you could get out now. Soon you feel the steady motion of Chelsea carrying you through the airport and being placed on the baggage conveyer belt. You hope that security would see you in the x-ray. Sadly for you, they think you’re just a doll and you are screened through to Chelsea’s plane.

After what seems like a very long time, you feel the bag you were in being loaded onto the plane. Soon you can hear and feel the plane talking off. You realize there was nothing to do but wait, so you find some soft material to lay on in the bag. Eventually you come across what feels like a pair of sweatpants and you fall asleep.

Meanwhile Chelsea was sitting in her seat listening to music and enjoying the flight. She was really looking forward to her friend’s birthday now that she got her such a cool present.

You are suddenly woken up by the motion of the plane landing.

“This is it” you think to yourself nervously.

You feel your bag being taken off the plane and being transported to the baggage claim. You again feel the motion of being carried on a conveyer belt. After a few minutes you hear the loud boom of footsteps approaching the bag.

You suddenly feel the motion of...
13522323.title: Locked in

choices: She hides you in her purse.
She hides you in her bra.
1352233.content:
“I see. Well, I’m glad I saw you,” she states. “I am heading to Miami for my friend’s birthday, and could use a snack during the long flight. I didn’t have time to purchase along the way over.”

“But you can’t eat me…”

“Hmm,” she replies, cutting you off. She brings you to her mouth and places you up to your waist inside, as if testing to see whether you are small enough to fit. And you are: her full lips are nearly twice your size. “It looks like I definitely can.”

“I have a life. You can’t just eat me now!”

“Oh don’t worry,” she explains matter-of-factly. “I’m not hungry yet; plus I’m going to take little nap. So you’ll have some time, maybe an hour or so until I work up an appetite.”

You begin to object, but she’s done talking about it. “Where should I put you where no one will see you during my nap?” she asks herself.

What does she decide?
1352233.title: Flight Snack

choices: Your captress opens up the bag you are in.
You manage to escape the bag.
The bag you are in is checked.
You get trapped underneath the various belongings.
14.content: You wake up and everything is black. You try to shuffle you're way around, but you're stuck. You're not sure exactly where you are and what is making you stuck, but you're surrounded by soft materials of various kinds. You're surroundings are constantly shifting, as you are being carried (except you haven't realized that are being carried nor that you've shrunk yet). You try to move around to determine anything about what's going on. What happens?
14.title: Strange Dark Place

141.content:
The shifting stops with a sudden thud as if the thing you are being carried in has been set down.
Suddenly, light shoots into the soft chamber of which you’re trapped in. You realize I’m horror you’re in someone’s luggage. As your eyes adjust to the light again you see you are surrounded by various types of women’s clothing. You look down to see yourself laying on top of a bra, one that looks like it belongs to a woman with large breasts.

Before you can really grasp the full gravity of the situation a giant hand with painted blue fingernails reaches into the luggage and scoops you up. You then look up to see the face of a giant woman staring right at you. She appeared to be in her early to mid twenties and had striaght long red hair. She was wearing a black tank top that exposed her breasts, tight jeans, and from what you see she was also wearing running shoes. She also was wearing a big silver bracelet on her left arm. As her big blue eyes studied you a smile came across her lips.
“Well hello there little guy” she said in a sweet voice
You’re still in too much of a state of shock to really respond. After all you just realized you spent god knows how long in this woman’s bag and now you’re in the palm of her hand.
“Awwww, you’re such a cutie!” She exclaimed wiggling her finger in front of you. “I’m so happy I caught you!”
“W-wait” You stammer “what do you mean caught me?”
“I shrunk you, silly” she explains
“I bought an experimental shrink ray on my way to the airport. I am on my way home from vacation and I saw you and I thought how great it would be to have a tiny guy like you all for myself.” she ended with a light poke at your tiny body.
“The person who sold it to me also said that the victim would be knocked out for a little while so it gave me plenty of time to put you in my luggage and take you somewhere where I can look at you with being noticed” she added
“I can’t go with you! I’m in college and I have a family! I’m flying home to see them!” you protest
“Too bad little one” the woman says feigning empathy “you’re mine now and you’re just going to have to live with that. I’ll take care of you I promise” with that she lifts you up to her mouth and gives you a kiss. Your entire body is covered by her lips and you’re covered in her saliva. She giggled and gently dried you off with her shirt.
“What are you going to do to me?” You say in a shaken tone.
“I haven’t really decided yet, but don’t worry. I have a nice long flight to think of something.”
Suddenly a loud speaker announced the woman’s flight.
“That’s us little guy, back into my bag you go” she says in a sing songy voice
With that she plucks you off her palm with her fingers, drops you in her bag and zips you up.
You feel the bag lift up and begin shifting again as the woman hums to herself. As you lay on the soft bed made out of her clothes you think about the predicament you’re in. You think that maybe everything will be fine, she seems like a nice woman (but obviously a little nuts) who wouldn’t want to hurt you. You also worry what she could do to you since you’re so small and at her mercy.

The woman makes her way onto her plane and stuffs her bag with you in it into the overhead bin above her seat. As the plane takes off you ponder your options. The zipper is close enough to try and open and you could make an escape attempt. You then think that there’s really nowhere to go on a plane 35,000 feet in the air. The clothes you are laying on are also very comfy and you’re tired from not being able to sleep the night before and you could use a nap, but this could be your only chance to escape this woman’s clutches.
What do you do?
141.title: Your captress opens up the bag you are in

choices: On the sidewalk far away from the airport
142.content:
You notice a light source coming from one of the corners of the dark place you are on. Walking over the light allows for you to see around, and you realize that you are in a gigantic bag of some kind. Outside, it is moving quickly against a hard floor, by some gigantic wheels.

The hole is just large enough to fit your small body, so you decide to climb out. You don’t know who this person is or why the shrank you, but you doubt it was for benevolent purposes. You land harshly against the ground and assess your surroundings. Where are you?
142.title: Hole to Freedom

choices: Try to get the attention of someone walking by
Try to run under a nearby counter for safety
Too late: Something or someone is coming right at you before you can react.
1421.content:
You realize you are in the international terminal. The woman walks away with her giant suitcase before you can get a good look at her. You are standing in the center of the walkway as hundreds of giant feet are moving around you. You must act quickly if you want to survive.

What do you decide to do?
1421.title: International Hussle

choices: Pick a nearby gate and find someone there.
Go to the food court to flag someone who's sitting to eat.
Jump onto the next person you see to ride to a quieter place.
14211.content:
You need to get someone’s help. Hundreds of people are walking around at you at incredible speed. One second you feel someone’s thunderous steps approaching, and the next they are gone completely. People who are seated and motionless might be easier to flag down.

You form an action plan:
14211.title: Get someone's attention

choices: Look around for another gate (more options)
142111.content: You look around for a nearby gate where people are sitting. They’d be easier to get the attention of. In front of you are two gates, which do you choose:
142111.title: Which gate?

1421113.content: Both these gates are boarding, with people moving to line up, so you realize they may not be the best places to choose. You find your way along the walls and continue looking. Here are a few more gates you see:
1421113.title: Another Gate

choices: You ran under the bar or service counter of a restaurant.
You ran under the desk of a duty-free store.
You ran under the front desk for a gate.
14212.content:
Everything is moving quickly around, so you must take action quickly. You notice a large counter in front of you and immediately go to duck under it as a reprieve from the chaos of thunderous steps. It would be about 20 feet away, though at your size, it’s a 3-4 minute sprint.

Once you get there, you only start to really look around and notice where you are and what type of counter you ran under.
14212.title: Run for Cover

choices: Try to get the bartender’s attention.
No time to decide: Her backpack falls on top of you, trapping you.
142121.content:
Now that you’re safe under this enormous counter, you stop running and analyze your situation. Your below the bar counter for a restaurant. In front of you is an empty stool with the space curved inwards to accommodate people’s feet. Under a narrow but crawlable gab on the other side stands the bartender, filling up a glass for another customer.

A woman comes and sits at the stool directly in front of you. She sets down her backpack, blocking a good view of the world in front of you. The bartender comes over to hand her a menu and ask what she would like.

You need to get some help. What do you do?
142121.title: Under the Bar

choices: You manage to slide yourself out.
She moves her backpack, maybe because someone sat down next to her.
She eventually gets up to leave.
1421213.content:
You begin to approach her giant foot, but you hear a loud rumble as her giant backpack falls over from its standing position. You fail to run away as the enormous canvas bag falls directly on top of you. You’re trapped as she, like the rest of the world, goes about her day.

You try to slide yourself out from underneath, but you don’t seem to be making any progress. Shrouded in darkness, you can’t see which way to go to get out.
1421213.title: Falling Bag

choices: Stuck on her bag as she hoists in the air too high up to jump off.
Launched into the air by the way she flings her back around her shoulder.
On the ground, exactly where you were, as she leaves.
14212133.content:
You struggle to break free but seem unable to. After several minutes, she finishes her food and gets up to leave. In one stroke, she grabs her backpack and gets up to go catch her flight.

Being stuck in the folds of her bag, you are…
14212133.title: Gotta get up and go

choices: Approach the clerk to get help.
Approach the passenger or someone else behind her in the line.
Wait it out until the situation calms down.
142123.content:
You catch your breath and look around to form a plan. You realize that you are at the front desk for a gate, in the space under the desk. In front of you is a giant flight clerk, busy looking at her computer. On the other side is an irate woman.

“What do you mean the flight is cancelled?” she shouts. “I need to get there today to meet my friends!”

“I’m sorry for the inconvenience from the weather,” the clerk apologizes. “Let me see what the next flight we can put you on.”

“This is some fucking bullshit,” she interjects.

“I understand,” the clerk responds.

You notice a large line of people forming behind this woman, each of whom are distraught from their flight cancelling. The clerk looks calm but busy as she fields everyone’s rerouting. You’ll need to get someone’s help, but what’s the best strategy?
142123.title: The Gate Desk

choices: She moves her leg unintentionally knocking you.
1421231.content:
You know it seems tense up there, but you need help now. And you know that it’s only going to get worse as more and more exasperated passengers line up to reschedule their flights. The clerk above is the closest official staff to help you in your predicament and hand you over to the police or medical authorities.

While the clerk is busy settling the angry passenger down and helping her think through alternative flights, you approach the woman’s foot. She is wearing black shoes, dress khakis, and a blue polo shirt uniform. You first try shouting, but that unsurprisingly does nothing given the loudness of the scene and the quietness of your voice. Next, you try to bang harshly against her shoe, which she doesn’t feel.

Then, you climb on top of her shoe and crawl over to her shin. Pulling back her the thick fabric of her pant cuff, you pound the flesh of her heel, hoping that would work.
1421231.title: The Clerk

choices: She thinks you’re a bug or rodent.
She can’t see what touched her.
14212311.content:
Her foot flinches at the impact of your fists causing you to slide down her shoe, and she looks down to see what’s going on.

“Hello?!” the passenger exclaims, none too happy about the sudden break in the conversation.

The clerk looks down at you.
14212311.title: Felt

142123112.content:
Seeing your body laying flat on the floor next to her, she scoops you up for closer examination. She brings you up to her waist and takes a good look to see what on earth you are, but careful not to show you to the angry customer.

You two lock eyes and in hers you see…
142123112.title: Noticed

choices: The clerk taps one of her heels knocking you to the ground (get on her shoe)
The clerk moves away from the desk to calm the customer down more.
1421231121.content:
The clerk shows a sign of concern and realizes that you need to be taken care of--so she mouths to you "Hide behind my shoe, while I take care of this customer."

You can see her mouthing to you and do as she says--hiding behind the right high heel of her shoe. Meanwhile the customer slams the desk and the clerk returns to the customer's irate expressions and words.

"You are going to take care of this!? Right!?" says the customer. The clerk responds and then she picks up the phone at her desk--she's getting another clerk to come to the desk and help her.

Meanwhile, you get a glimpse of what is behind the desk--the clerk's purse and a few file folders and boxes. Suddenly your stomach growls--maybe the clerk's purse might have some peanuts or maybe some candy? You venture toward the purse...when...
1421231121.title: "Hide behind my shoe's heel"

choices: She keeps you safe till she goes home.
14212311211.content:
As you fall down from the tapping of her shoe you latch on and climb up and hit her foot to let her know you are on.

You no sooner got on back up arrived. 'Can you take over for me I need to use the restroom. You hear the clerk helping you ask the back up.

'Sure! Take your time no rush' the back up replied.

After that the clerk got out of sight of the gate and picked you up for safety then proceeded to the employee's restroom locking the door behind her.

What happens next?
14212311211.title: The clerk taps one of her heels knocking you to...

142123112111.content:
The clerk said 'my name is Kim, and im a inventor as a hobby I think I can help you get back to normal. Whats your name?' She stated.

You reply 'I don't remember it's all a foggy blurr after I entered the airport and shrunk. It's like my whole life before then never existed because I can't remember anything at all.'

Then Kim gives you a tiny phone that to your surprise works and only has 1 number saved. And its her's.

She says 'now stay in my bra till I get home if you need re-adjusting text me I will pull you out when i get home.'

With that she uses the toilet because she did really need to go then went back to the gate and releaved the back up and continued on with her shift.

Until what happens?

Try to sneak out and get more immediate help from someone else.

She looked back at you flabbergasted. You knew this sort of look: like she had enough things to do with all the passengers and could not process such a strange thing as the existence of a tiny you. She places you under the computer monitor, below view from the passengers, and goes back to the current passenger.

You try to shout back out at her, running to the edge of the desk, but she gently knocks you back underneath the monitor when you stray into the view of the passengers. She may need to process the storm of passengers before she can deal with you.

You need help quickly, though, so is that good enough? You must decide what to do.

choices: Her anger is replaced with shock
Without a word she grabs you
1421232.content:
You figure your best option is to climb up the angry woman’s jeans and jump onto the counter where you can get her attention. She’s pissed but she’s remaining stationary and looks like she won’t move for a long time.

Confident in your decision, you start climbing up the woman’s sneakers and you make it to her jeans. The woman is too busy laying into the lady at the ticket counter to notice you. As you climb up her jeans her shouting voice begins to hurt your ears. You also feel bad for the poor ticket lady who has to take her abuse. You start to wonder if maybe this wasn’t that good of an idea.

“Well there’s no turning back now” you think as you continue to climb.

You reach the woman’s waste and grab onto her black t-shirt. After a few minutes of climbing you’re level with the table. By now she’s leaning into it so you easily step onto the table.

You stare up at the angry woman. She has shoulder length brown hair and blue eyes. She looks to be in her mid 30s. She also has pale skin. With all the courage you can’t muster you start to shout and wave your arms.

“HEY MISS OVER HERE!!” You shout as you jump up and down.

You repeat this for almost a minute and the woman finally stops yelling to look down. She stares right at you and...
1421232.title: Climbing the enraged woman.

14212322.content:
She turns back to the customer service representative with the same angry expression as before. You know that isn’t good.

“AND GET THESE FUCKING BUGS OFF THE COUNTER!” She shouts.

You see her and come down and before you have time to react she vigorously pushes you off the counter and you are sent flying.

You are sent flying through the gate as your life flashes before your eyes. You hope to God you don’t land on a hard surface as you assume that would lead to certain death. You curse yourself for thinking your idea would work. You look down and see that you are about to land. You brace for impact as you land in...
14212322.title: Sent flying

142123223.content:
You find yourself opening your eyes on top of a shoe of a little gurl who looks to be about 12-13 years old. You pause in fear and take in the sight of this young giantess and think of potential pros and cons to trying to get her attention.


What should you do?
142123223.title: Writer’s choice

choices: You pass out, you awake to being at the girls house.
1421232231.content:
You decide to stay with this little girl, and think its best to remain hidden until she is at a safer place to try anything.

You look at her laces and notice that you are about the same thickness as her shoe lace so you tie yourself up into them and wait for your chance!


Whats next?
1421232231.title: Stay on her shoe.

choices: She’s rushed and simply tucks you away to call into a business meeting she has.
14212323.content:
“Our next flight will get you there by noon tomorrow,” the clerk explains, through the options on her computer.

“What?!” the woman protests. “I need to get there by today.”

“Well, let’s see…” the clerk responds, typing quickly on her computer.

That’s what they were saying while you tried flagging down the clerk, but she is too busy searching through options to register. The agitated woman, however, locks eyes on you, and quickly grabs you in her fist.

“You know, I think it’ll be fine. Just put me on whatever,” she states suddenly.

“You mean Flight 343 with an arrival at 12:03 pm tomorrow?” the clerks confirms.

“Yes, yes,” the woman suddenly interjects as if trying to quickly get through the process.

“Ok great. Sorry again for the inconvenience,” the clerk continues, typing again on the computer and eventually reaching for the ticket she printed. “Here’s everything you need.”

The woman grabs the paper with her other hand and rushes out with you towed in her fist. You can hear her speeding through the airport but cannot see where she’s going. Eventually, she opens up her fist and places you onto her lap. You notice that you’re in a quiet corner of the airport, far away from the crowd of rescheduled passengers.

You look up at her…
14212323.title: Grabbed

choices: A giant shoe about to step on you.
Someone is about to roll their suitcase right into you.
14213.content:
Before you can formulate a plan, though, a large shadow falls over you. You don’t register it at first, but you start to realize that something is coming your way.

You look up too late to see…
14213.title: Incoming!

choices: Try to jump or duck out of its way.
Jump until it to brace for impact.
Too late: it whacks right into you.
142132.content:
The crushing noise of plastic wheels temporarily deafens you. Looking up, you see a large black suitcase coming straight at you. Someone is just rolling it down the airport on her way to somewhere, oblivious to your existence.

Being about a foot in each direction – about a dozen feet for you – and only a few seconds from collision, you doubt you have time to get out of its way. Its wheels leave about an half-inch between the ground and the bottom of the suitcase, about half your height and not likely enough to duck under.

You think quickly as it comes straight for you…
142132.title: It’s a Coming

142133.content:
You look up to see a gorgeous woman staring down at you, she’s covering her mouth in disbelief. The woman looks to be in her late 20s. She las long wavy blonde hair and pale skin. She’s wearing black high heeled boots as well as a black business skirt.

You try waving your arms and yelling up at her.

“Excuse me miss! Can you please help me?” You shout. “I’ve been shrunk and I’m pretty sure I just escape from some lady’s suitcase who was trying to kidnap me!”

Her expression changes from shock to a warm smile on her face. You see her giant hand reaching down for you, knowing where this is going you...
142133.title: Someone looking right at you.

choices: The woman speaks but not in English
She speaks to you in English
1421331.content:
Hoping she will help you, you stay put and let the woman’s giant fingers scoop you up and trap you in her closed hand. You can feel g-forces as she lifts you up off the ground. Soon you can feel the steady motion of her footsteps and the thunderous sound of her foot steps as she makes her way through the airport.

After a few minutes of walking and being trapped in the woman’s soft palm, you feel a rush of light as she open up her hand. After a few seconds of your eyes adjusting to the light, you see the giant face of your captress staring at you with a big smile. Her big emerald eyes look at you, studying every inch of you as you sit nervously on her palm.

What happens next?
1421331.title: Let her pick you up

choices: Before you can decide, the woman’s phone goes off
14213311.content:
“Was sind sie?” you hear the woman say. “Warum bist so klein? Hast du ein Name?“

“Excuse me?” You say in a confused voice. “I don’t have any idea what you’re saying.”

“Est tut mir Leid, ich verstehe nicht. Ich spreche kein English.“ the Woman continues

“Listen, I shrunk somehow and was kidnapped by some woman and I just escaped from her luggage. Please help me! Take me to security or something.” You say slowly.

The woman just cocks her said to one side and gives you a confused expression as you talk.

“Est tut mir Leid kleiner Mann, ich verstehst du nicht“ the Woman says frowning, but soon she gets the same big smile as before.

“Aber du bist sehr niedlich und ich möchte ein niedlich Haustier.” The Woman says as she starts stroking your back with her index finger. You don’t know what’s going on but you’re starting to get the feeling she isn’t planning to help you get unshurnk.

“What are you doing lady?!” You say indignantly trying to push her finger away..

Suddenly the woman picks you up and holds you close to her face between her thumb and index finger.

“Was für ein lebhaftes kleines Ding. Du bist das perfekte Haustier. Jetzt lass mich dir einen Kuss geben!“

The woman moves you to her mouth as her lips start to pucker.

“Hey what are you?!” You start shouting.

Before you can finish you’re pressed against the giant woman’s lips as the engulf your tiny body. She pulls you back and your body is covered from head to toe in a thin layer of saliva. The woman smiles at you and blows on you a little.

“Zeit meinen Flug zu erwischen, kleiner Mann.” Your captress says. “Du kannst in meiner Handtasche reiten” she continues, winking at you.


Before you can try to fathom what she’s saying you see her unzipping her purse and lowering you inside. She places you between what looks like some lipstick and travel sized Kleenex.

“Let me out of here! I need to get back to normal size!” You shout at the woman.

The woman just smiles down at you and waves. With that she zips up her purse and starts walking, leaving you in darkness. The soothing rocking motion of her purse as she makes her way through the airport is relaxing but you still are afraid of what she’s going to do to you. It’s pretty clear to you that she doesn’t want to unshrink you.

After around 10 minutes the woman starts walking. From what you can tell, she’s standing in a line somewhere. Your heart sinks when you hear a loud speaker announcing that her flight is boarding, it sinks even more when you hear it’s going all the way to Germany.

“Well, at least now I know what language she’s speaking” you think.

You don’t have much time to think about that as reality kicks in. Knowing you need to get out of here before gets on her plane, you try to push some objects up against the purse to try to climb to the zipper, but it’s no use. Every time to try to, they knock over. Soon you feel the woman setting down her purse on the plane and taking her seat.

Slightly defeated, you think about trying to escape before the plane takes off. It could work but it would take a lot of luck and strategy. Both of which you don’t seem to have right now. On the other hand the woman didn’t seem too bad and you wonder if it would be better just to wait out the flight and see what happens.

What do you decide?
14213311.title: Foreign beauty

choices: You eventually relax and fall asleep
The woman takes you out of her purse mid flight
142133112.content:
You figure she doesn’t have any malevolent intentions towards you given the way she talked to you and her facial expressions. You decide that there’s nothing you can really do except wait out the flight and try to get through to her when you see her again. You hope that she will take you out mid flight or something and you can try to communicate with her then.

Soon you hear the sound of the flight attendant welcoming everyone on board the flight and giving safety instructions. You feel nervous as you hear the plane’s powerful jet engines lift the plane into the sky. The feeling of total entrapment sets in.

As you fly towards what looks like will be your new home, you worry about what will happen next and what the woman plans to do to you. She may have sounded nice but she also knows you don’t speak her language and she could be sounding kind to lure you into a false sense of security. You go through every possibility in your mind from being sold on the Black Market to being the woman’s in flight snack. The suspense is starting to get to you and you begin to quiver in fear.

What happens next?
142133112.title: Prepping for take off

choices: The woman puts you back in her purse
The woman in the other seat wakes up.
1421331122.content:
Suddenly, light rushes into your prison and you can see the woman’s giant hand reaching towards you. Before you can dodge her, she scoops you up In her closed hand. When she opens her hand you see your self looking straight at her giant face. You look around to see where you are. You see the woman is sitting next to the window, her purse is in her lap, and you can see another woman sitting in the aisle seat sleeping.

You are noticeably scared as you look into her giant eyes. Your captress seems to notice this and gives you a cutesy expression. You’re startled as you suddenly feel something on your back, you realize it’s the woman’s finger. She slowly starts caressing you gently all over while giving you a loving smile.

“Hab keine Angst meine Haustier” your captress says quietly. “Du musst Hunger haben”

“What?” You say.

This language barrier is starting to annoy you atop of making you feel all the more scared.

You see the woman reach down into the pouch in the seat in front of her and see her pull out a pack of M&Ms. You see her dump as few into her mouth. You flinch as you hear the M&Ms get pulverized by her massive teeth and savored by her tongue. You can even hear a *gulp* as she swallows her snack.

“Mach dir keine Sorgen, ich werde dich nich essen” she says with a smile. “Heir, hab eins. Ich kann mein Haustier nicht hungern lassen.”

The woman hands you an M&M and sets you down on your lap. You can’t help but smile, you love chocolate and you think it’s pretty cool having a giant M&M. The woman watches you eat your snack and giggles as she watches.

“Thank you” You say in a shy voice with a smile.

The woman smiles back at you, once again she scoops you up in her hand and you are brought up to her face.

“Du bist ganz bezaubernd!” She squeals quietly.

She gives you several kisses that cover your entire body, eventually after about 40 seconds she relents and gives you room to breath.

“Jetzt musst du zurück in meine Handtasche, bevor dich jemand sieht” she says.

What happens next?
1421331122.title: The woman takes you out of her purse mid flight

choices: The security guard checks the bag anyway.

That best friend had used her connections to become Natalya's commanding officer. It had all worked out so well.

Natalya's commander had told her that all the tests needed were done. Still she was toying with the idea of keeping Tim for herself in case she wanted to run more tests. If not, then Natalya would be allowed to keep Tim as a pocket pet, provided she pass to her commander notes on how the test subject was adjusting to his new situation.

Later that night, when the parade had ended, Natalya unbuttoned her right uniform breast pocket and fished Tim out of it.
1533212.title: Sealed in Her Breast Pocket

choices: Natalya admits her commander gave you to her as a pocket pet.
Natalya offers a plan to evade those responsible for shrinking you.
15332122.content:
Before releasing her Tiny Tim from the pocket of her army uniform, Natalya bit her lip. Tim Thompson had been pleasantly surprised when Natalya had chosen him as a boyfriend. On the one hand, he was introverted and less of a stud than many of his classmates. But Natalya had chosen him with a suitable pocket pet in mind. He was a witty and funny companion. If she revealed to him, what had happened, then his timidity and desire for a woman's affection could be easily be used to train him to be a docile pet in short order.

On the other hand, revealing to him her betrayal of him and reduction of him to be a shrunken test subject would break his heart. Certainly he would be a less perky pocket pet. She could say that she was a rogue agent, trying to save him from her superiors to allay any suspicions and insist that he stay hidden to help her protect him. That would have the added advantage that he would insist in staying in her pocket to avoid detection. With enough affection and gestures of affection, he would eventually become a perky sidekick to a kind and loving mistress.

Making her decision, she fished out of her pocket and held in front of her face and in the palm of her hand.

"Tim, we need to talk."
15332122.title: Natalya keeps you as her pocket pet.

choices: Natalya takes you to her home
Natalya takes you into the remote Russian wilderness
Natalya hides in plain sight, and takes you to her barracks
153321222.content:
"I'll be honest," Natalya continues, her broad face radiating nothing but truth. "We're safe for the moment, but I couldn't say for how much longer. Agents of the enemy are on our trail right now, and we can't stay in one place for too long in case they find us. Even taking the time to talk to you now is probably risking a bullet."

"Thank you so much," you gush. "I was so lucky for you to find me."

"Now we must hide," she continues, drowning out your words with her deep, authoritative voice. "We cannot be remaining here, and so we must go into hiding. Alone somewhere, just us two..."

The way she says that, you get the feeling it won't just be the danger that pulls you both together!
153321222.title: On The Run

153322.content:
You dodge out of the parade route to avoid being squashed!

"Ming! Ming! Ming!" You cry, hoping to be rescued.

Ming trips in her high heels.

If she heard you, it would be a way to rescue you. If she didn't, her friends would likely help her back up before you could reach her.

When she gets back up and marches on, you are

As you rest against the cloth of your girlfriend's uniform pocket, you appreciate the cushion provided by her right breast. Yet as she continues marching through the parade, you begin to get suspicious about the coincidences. The coincidence that you were to meet her at the airport. The coincidence that you shrank at the airport. The coincidence that you blacked out and woke up in her country. The coincidence that she picked you up off the street without showing shock. Too many coincidences.

info.brief_description: You are shrunk in an airport.
info.description:
The premise of the story is simple: While at an airport, you blank out and wake up after having shrunk to about an 1 inch tall. "You" are a male and in your twenties. The reason for you shrinking is unknown (unless explained in a thread). Feel free to let your imagination take you.

Let's set up some ground rules:

1) No male interactions and no toilet (You can have a male bring a shrunken individual to a female, but keep the male interaction very brief, no more than a few sentences. Don’t dwell on it.)

2) Please make sure your post advances the story in some way, as opposed to short pointless posts like "She smashed you, and you died."

3) Good grammar is preferable. Not to say, I'll hound you for having a slight mistake, but if there are so many misspelling or grammar, then it's unreadable. Also use punctuation. I don't want to sound like a perfectionist, but these things exist so that the reader can read it easily.

4) Use paragraphs breaks. This may seem like an odd rule, but I've seen too many posts in various Interactives write the whole thing as only long paragraph. It's incredibly hard to read as it is hard on the eyes. USE WHITE SPACE! It exists for a reason. Otherwise, readers have trouble following it.

When you have dialogue, try to make every new statement its own paragraph. That makes it easier to read.

5) Make sure to have at least 2 options for each post you make. In interactives the point is to have options, so don't force the reader to go a certain path too often.

6) I prefer humiliation, feet, vore, mouth play, crush, slave, and entrapment, but you don't have to follow my preferences. Make your posts your own.

Otherwise have fun! Don't get put off by the boring part of establishing rules: it's annoying but necessarily.
